translation.en: [group] ♪ …birthday, dear Franny ♪
translation.zh: （当年春天）

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: -[man] Happy birthday. -[woman] Good job, girls.
translation.zh: -生日快乐 弗兰妮 -厉害啊 姑娘们

translation.en: Oh, I love you, baby, so much!
translation.zh: 我爱你 宝贝 非常爱你！

translation.en: [girl] Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: I'm gonna get you guys some cake.
translation.zh: 我把蛋糕给你们拿过来

translation.en: -Uh, I'll get some wine. [kisses] -Okay.
translation.zh: -我去拿点葡萄酒 -好的

translation.en: -Let me do that. -Oh.
translation.zh: 让我来吧 这样你可以去吃点东西

translation.en: -That way, you can actually eat. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 让我来吧 这样你可以去吃点东西 谢谢

translation.en: You've been looking so thin, you're making us moms look terrible.
translation.zh: 你最近看起来非常瘦 相比较我们其他妈妈的身材很糟糕

translation.en: -Good, right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -很好吃吧？ -是的

translation.en: What's the matter, Mom?
translation.zh: 怎么了 妈妈？

translation.en: It's hot. Your father can't keep his eyes open.
translation.zh: 这里好热 你爸爸都睁不开眼睛了

translation.en: -Oh, I'm fine. -It is a four-hour drive from Worcester.
translation.zh: -我没事 -从伍斯特到这里 开车要四个小时

translation.en: I know. I'm going to make you guys some coffee.
translation.zh: 我知道 我去给你们弄点咖啡 好吗？

translation.en: Can you make a pot of coffee? And we need another bottle of white wine.
translation.zh: 你能煮一壶咖啡吗？ 我们还需要一瓶白葡萄酒

translation.en: White wine, right. On it. Mom, can you do the coffee?
translation.zh: -白葡萄酒 好 妈妈 你能煮咖啡吗？ -好

translation.en: [woman] I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上回来

translation.en: Everyone, if you all raise your cups. To Dr. George, huh?
translation.zh: 各位 请大家举起手中的杯子 敬乔治博士

translation.en: [all] Hear, hear!
translation.zh: 干杯！

translation.en: -It is official, right? -Yeah, it is officially official.
translation.zh: -正式定了吧？ -对 正式定了

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm no longer a PhD widow. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 对 我不再是如同丧偶的博士妻子了

translation.en: And I have some more good news.
translation.zh: 我还有别的好消息

translation.en: Uh, my dissertation actually landed me a gig upstate.
translation.zh: 我还有别的好消息 我的毕业论文 让我在纽约上州找到一份工作

translation.en: -[woman 2] Wow, fast. -[man 2] It must be really good.
translation.zh: -真够快的 -你的论文一定写得不错

translation.en: I haven't read it yet.
translation.zh: 我还没有读过

translation.en: -George is very secretive. -No, I am chickenshit.
translation.zh: -乔治做事总是遮遮掩掩 -不是 我只是很胆小而已

translation.en: Catherine was top of the class at art school.
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳以前可是艺术学校的尖子生

translation.en: -Oh, is the position at Bard? -No, it's at Saginaw.
translation.zh: -是巴德学院的职位吗？ -不是 是塞基诺

translation.en: It's a small private college upstate.
translation.zh: 上州的一所小型私立学院

translation.en: You're a big city girl now with your dream job.
translation.zh: 你现在是大城市的姑娘 做着自己梦想中的工作

translation.en: You thought this through?
translation.zh: 你想清楚了吗？

translation.en: George really wants this. He hates the struggle here.
translation.zh: 乔治真的很想去 他讨厌在这里苦苦挣扎

translation.en: It's gotten worse since his father cut him off.
translation.zh: 自从他爸爸不给他提供经济支持后 情况就更糟了

translation.en: And I had no idea he was even taking money from them.
translation.zh: 我之前根本不知道他在拿父母的钱

translation.en: Apparently, it's been happening since Franny was born.
translation.zh: 实际上从弗兰妮出生起就开始了

translation.en: Moving's expensive, too.
translation.zh: 搬家也很贵的

translation.en: I know, but you can get a lot for a little up there.
translation.zh: 但是那边用一点钱就能买很多东西

translation.en: -It's supposedly really pretty. -Yeah, I've driven through there.
translation.zh: -而且应该非常漂亮 -是啊 我曾开车路过

translation.en: Rich horsey weekenders and lots of full-time rednecks.
translation.zh: 当地全职工作的都是乡巴佬 有钱人只是周末去骑骑马

translation.en: I know, but George has made some big sacrifices for me,
translation.zh: 我知道 但乔治为我做了很大的牺牲

translation.en: and I-- I owe it to him to at least try.
translation.zh: 这是我欠他的 我至少应该尝试一下

translation.en: [Catherine] Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: [George] Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I think I've found the perfect house for us.
translation.zh: 我想我找到了最合适的房子

translation.en: -[door opens] -[woman] Oh, there we are. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 终于打开了

translation.en: This lock is a bit tricky.
translation.zh: 这个门锁有点难开

translation.en: -[George] Wow, beautiful. -[Catherine sighs]
translation.zh: 哇 很漂亮

translation.en: -[woman] Okay. -[George] Huh?
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: As I told George last week, it's from the late 1800s.
translation.zh: 我上周跟乔治说过 这栋房子建于19世纪末

translation.en: [woman] There's definitely updating that needs to be done.
translation.zh: 这里肯定有一些需要升级改造的地方

translation.en: Yes, certainly could use a paint job.
translation.zh: 是的 绝对需要重新粉刷

translation.en: Yeah, but look at these bones, huh? Amazing!
translation.zh: 是的 但是看看这些结构 太棒了！

translation.en: You have to have a real vision for an old place like this.
translation.zh: 要改建这样的老房子 需要有一个懂行的人

translation.en: Well, my wife is a trained art restorer, so we're in good hands.
translation.zh: 我妻子是受过训练的艺术品修复师 这个问题应该难不倒我们

translation.en: Why would someone just leave this here?
translation.zh: 为什么会有人把这架钢琴丢在这里？

translation.en: This is so beautiful.
translation.zh: 多漂亮啊

translation.en: [sighs] Dairy farmers everywhere are falling on hard times.
translation.zh: 各地的奶农日子都不好过

translation.en: -It's a-- a tough business these days. -[piano notes]
translation.zh: 现在的生意不好做

translation.en: [sighs] So sad.
translation.zh: 太悲伤了

translation.en: It is sad.
translation.zh: 确实很悲伤

translation.en: [George] We'll make it happy.
translation.zh: 我们会让这里变得幸福

translation.en: You wanna see the rest, don't you? Come on.
translation.zh: 你还想看看其他地方 对吧？来吧

translation.en: Show it to me.
translation.zh: 给我展示展示

translation.en: -[Catherine] Show me the upstairs. -[George] Okay, upstairs.
translation.zh: -带我看看楼上 乔治 -好的 楼上

translation.en: [Catherine] How big is it?
translation.zh: 这里有多大？

translation.en: [Catherine] Hey. Remember this?
translation.zh: 还记得这个吗？

translation.en: -[Catherine] Here. This is right… -[George] Okay.
translation.zh: 这里…

translation.en: Hey, uh, George,
translation.zh: 喂 乔治

translation.en: I was gonna put your little seascapes, you know, above the piano, -but I-- I can't find them. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我本想把你的海景画放在钢琴上面的 但我找不到了

translation.en: -Sorry. I packed them for my office. -Aw.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我把画打包寄到我的办公室了

translation.en: I love those things.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢那些画的

translation.en: Yeah, I thought it would show off a relic of my former life. Oh!
translation.zh: 我觉得那些画 能让我炫耀一下以往生活的痕迹

translation.en: You know, maybe this house is going to inspire you to start painting again.
translation.zh: 或许这栋房子会激励你再次开始作画

translation.en: Mm, nah, I think, since my dissertation, I… I really see myself as a writer.
translation.zh: 我觉得不会 自从写完论文 我就觉得自己是作家了

translation.en: Okay, the cat or the doll?
translation.zh: 好 猫咪还是娃娃？

translation.en: Which one?
translation.zh: 哪一个？

translation.en: I think she's finally out.
translation.zh: 她终于睡着了

translation.en: Are you stressed about tomorrow?
translation.zh: 想到明天 你会紧张吗？

translation.en: Yeah-- No. Should I be?
translation.zh: 不会 我应该紧张吗？

translation.en: Well, first day jitters are a normal human reaction.
translation.zh: 上班第一天紧张是正常人类的反应

translation.en: Are you looking for a reason to de-stress?
translation.zh: 你是在找借口解压吗？

translation.en: -Do I need a reason? -No.
translation.zh: 我需要借口吗？

translation.en: How do you want me to de-stress you?
translation.zh: 你想让我怎么给你解压？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: What is that smell?
translation.zh: 这是什么味道？

translation.en: You smell that? It smells like car exhaust fumes.
translation.zh: 你闻到了吗？像是汽车尾气

translation.en: -Right? -Yeah, I… I guess I smell… smell it.
translation.zh: -对吧？ -对 我好像也闻到了

translation.en: And it's getting stronger.
translation.zh: 而且味道越来越大

translation.en: Do you think ghosts use premium unleaded?
translation.zh: 你觉得鬼魂会用优质无铅汽油吗？

translation.en: I'm serious, George. Stop.
translation.zh: 我是认真的 乔治 别闹

translation.en: -Mommy, Mommy, I'm scared! -[Catherine] Oh God! It's okay. Oh!
translation.zh: 妈妈 我好害怕！ -没事的 过来 -我好害怕！

translation.en: -Come here. -I'm scared!
translation.zh: -没事的 过来 -我好害怕！

translation.en: -Tuck in, baby girl. All right. -[George sighs]
translation.zh: 钻进来吧 宝贝 好了

translation.en: Wait, really?
translation.zh: 等等 你是认真的？

translation.en: Mommy, I'm scared. I don't wanna sleep in there.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我好害怕 我不想在那里睡

translation.en: [George] America's Rhine.
translation.zh: 美国的莱茵河

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Oh, it is a dream setting for a campus.
translation.zh: 这里是一个很理想的校园环境

translation.en: Full disclosure, Claire.
translation.zh: 我们就明说了 克莱尔

translation.en: Your chapter on how Swedenborg influenced the art of George Inness
translation.zh: 你写的史威登堡如何影响 乔治·英尼斯艺术风格的章节

translation.en: is what landed you here.
translation.zh: 让你得到了这个职位

translation.en: [chuckles] Swedenborg, really? That's… that's interesting.
translation.zh: 史威登堡 真的吗？那倒是有趣

translation.en: It's the part of my dissertation I struggled with the most.
translation.zh: 那是我论文中最纠结的一个部分

translation.en: How so?
translation.zh: 此话怎讲？

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Uh, I-I guess I'm a bit of a cliché, the New York cynic.
translation.zh: 我想我有些老生常谈了 就像纽约犬儒学派的人

translation.en: That… How a-a painter as brilliant as Inness
translation.zh: 说…像英尼斯那样聪慧的画师

translation.en: could fall for some 18th-century mystic still baffles me.
translation.zh: 怎么会对18世纪的神秘主义者感兴趣 我至今依然感到迷惑

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, Swedenborg…
translation.zh: 我至今依然感到迷惑 史威登堡…

translation.en: He wasn't just some mystic.
translation.zh: 他不只是一个神秘主义者

translation.en: He keenly understood that everything in the natural world
translation.zh: 他深知自然世界中的一切

translation.en: has a counterpart in the spiritual realm.
translation.zh: 都在精神国度中有对应的事物

translation.en: And Inness painted landscapes with this in mind.
translation.zh: 英尼斯画风景画时脑中带着这种想法

translation.en: I-I get that.
translation.zh: 这点我明白

translation.en: Oh, this is my office in case you need me.
translation.zh: 如果你需要找我 这是我的办公室

translation.en: -Wow, beautiful. -Mh-hm.
translation.zh: 哇 好漂亮

translation.en: My-- my trouble with Swedenborg is his communicating with angels and ghosts.
translation.zh: 我对史威登堡的疑问是 他与天使和鬼魂的交流

translation.en: Glorifying death as this… as this grand passage.
translation.zh: 将死亡美化成一条金光大道

translation.en: You should know that Swedenborg still has a devoted following
translation.zh: 你应该知道史威登堡 在这个领域依然有

translation.en: in this neck of the woods, myself included.
translation.zh: 虔诚的跟随者 包括我本人

translation.en: We even have séances on occasion. I'll invite you.
translation.zh: 我们偶尔还会举办降神会 我会邀请你的

translation.en: [chuckles] I'll-- I will bring my wife.
translation.zh: 我会带上我妻子

translation.en: She is the… the true believer of the family.
translation.zh: 她是我们家中的忠实信徒

translation.en: Well, this is your office right here.
translation.zh: 这里就是你的办公室

translation.en: [man] I guess I picked the wrong welcome gift.
translation.zh: 看来我选错了欢迎你的礼物

translation.en: [George chuckles] Well, I… I can't argue with the cover art.
translation.zh: （《所见所闻》 伊曼纽·史威登堡著） 封面这幅画还是不错的

translation.en: The Valley of the Shadow of Death.
translation.zh: 《死荫的幽谷》

translation.en: Ahh, that is George Inness at his best.
translation.zh: 《死荫的幽谷》 这就是乔治·英尼斯的巅峰之作

translation.en: Well, you are now officially in Inness territory.
translation.zh: 好了 你现在 正式进入英尼斯的领地了

translation.en: Don't be surprised if you start seeing things his way.
translation.zh: 如果你开始以他的视角看事物 不要意外

translation.en: Thank you, Floyd.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 弗洛伊德

translation.en: -[Catherine] Hi. -Hello.
translation.zh: -嗨 -你好

translation.en: Mrs. Claire, right? Yeah, can I help you?
translation.zh: -克莱尔太太 对吧？ -对 有什么需要？

translation.en: Uh, yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 是的 夫人

translation.en: My name's Eddie Lucks, and this here's my younger brother Cole.
translation.zh: 我叫艾迪·拉克斯 这是我弟弟科尔

translation.en: We just wanted to introduce ourselves in case you're in need of a hired hand.
translation.zh: 我们只是想来让你认识一下 说不定你需要雇人帮忙

translation.en: We do gardening, carpentry, plumbing.
translation.zh: 我们做园丁、木工、水管工

translation.en: When it comes to painting, we're regular Leonardos.
translation.zh: 至于粉刷 我们就是当代达芬奇

translation.en: -Best part of all is, we come real cheap. -Hey, like my marble?
translation.zh: 最棒的是 我们的费用很低 喜欢我的弹珠吗？

translation.en: Yeah, nice. You want me to show you how to shoot?
translation.zh: 喜欢 很漂亮 你想看看我怎么打弹珠吗？

translation.en: Oh, I forgot to mention that Cole is the best babysitter in town.
translation.zh: 我还忘记说了 科尔是镇上最棒的育儿保姆

translation.en: Yeah, I can see that. Where do you boys live?
translation.zh: 是啊 看出来了 你们两个住在哪里？

translation.en: In town with our uncle.
translation.zh: 在镇上和我们舅舅住在一起

translation.en: We got plenty of references if that's what you need.
translation.zh: 如果你需要推荐人 我们可以找很多

translation.en: Okay. Do you have a business card?
translation.zh: 好 你们有名片吗？

translation.en: -A card? Um… -[Franny and Cole chatting indistinctly]
translation.zh: 名片？

translation.en: Let me see.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: Oh, I left my business cards at home. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我把名片忘在家里了

translation.en: -I got a pen. -[Franny] Yeah!
translation.zh: 我有笔

translation.en: I think we should just hire them.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该雇他们

translation.en: Shouldn't we get one more quote? There's a lot of other groundskeepers in town.
translation.zh: 我们不应该再找别人问问吗？ 镇上有很多园丁

translation.en: I already did, and they… run like half the price.
translation.zh: 我已经问过了 他们的价格是别人的一半

translation.en: Cath, please don't tell me you're back on the whole salads-only thing.
translation.zh: 千万别告诉我 你又开始只吃沙拉了

translation.en: I ate a big lunch today.
translation.zh: 我今天午餐吃了很多

translation.en: What about the protein shakes the doctor recommended?
translation.zh: 医生推荐的那个蛋白质奶昔呢？

translation.en: I saw you skipped it this morning.
translation.zh: 我看到了你今天早上没吃

translation.en: I am doing them at night now because it's easier on my stomach.
translation.zh: 我现在改到晚上吃了 因为这样我的胃会更轻松

translation.en: -Franny, you want some more rice? -No, I want a pony ride.
translation.zh: -弗兰妮 你想再吃点米饭吗？ -不想 我想要骑小马

translation.en: -[Franny] Go, pony, go! -[George] I am.
translation.zh: -驾 小马 驾！ -我在走了

translation.en: [Franny] Go, pony, go!
translation.zh: 驾 小马 驾！

translation.en: [George] You are terrorizing.
translation.zh: 你这是威胁恐吓

translation.en: Oh, look, there's another pony.
translation.zh: 看 这里还有一只小马

translation.en: Okay. Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: -One, two, three. -Horsey.
translation.zh: -一、二、三 -骑马喽

translation.en: -[Franny] Pony! -[George] Gosh.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -You coming? -Yeah, in a second. I have to do dishes.
translation.zh: -你来吗？ -马上 我还要洗一下盘子

translation.en: Oh, can you get that pot for me, please?
translation.zh: 你能帮我把那个锅拿过来吗？

translation.en: -Thank you. I'll be up soon. -Okay.
translation.zh: -谢谢 我很快就上楼 -好

translation.en: Don't be long. I'm pretty tired.
translation.zh: 别太久了 我很累了

translation.en: "Damned."
translation.zh: “该下地狱的”

translation.en: George.
translation.zh: 乔治

translation.en: Hey, George. George.
translation.zh: 喂 乔治

translation.en: I'm a-- I'm asleep.
translation.zh: 我睡了

translation.en: -[woman 1] Where? -[woman 2] Eight.
translation.zh: -在哪儿？ -八

translation.en: -[woman 1] Three pounds is a lot. -You've got to be telling--
translation.zh: -三磅很多啊 -不是 你要说出…

translation.en: Company.
translation.zh: 有人来了

translation.en: Hi. Are you the Historical Society?
translation.zh: 你们好 你们是历史学会的吗？

translation.en: Indeed we are.
translation.zh: 我们确实是

translation.en: Um, I don't know if you need volunteers,
translation.zh: 我不知道你们是否需要志愿者

translation.en: but I'm new in town, and I would love to meet people
translation.zh: 但我是镇上新来的 我想多认识人

translation.en: and possibly learn more about the area.
translation.zh: 再多了解一下这片地区

translation.en: Write your information down.
translation.zh: 把你的个人信息写下来

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [blind woman] We'll send you a schedule.
translation.zh: 我们会给你发日程表的

translation.en: And also, I was curious
translation.zh: 还有 我很好奇

translation.en: if you had any information on some of the older homes in the area,
translation.zh: 你们是否知道这片地区 一些老房子的信息

translation.en: being that I just bought one.
translation.zh: 因为我刚买了一栋

translation.en: Actually, there's a picture of your house hanging up.
translation.zh: 其实这里挂了一张你家的照片

translation.en: -Really? Where? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？在哪里？ -对

translation.en: In the other room. The couple who built it is in it, too.
translation.zh: 在另一个房间 还有建造那栋房子的夫妻也在照片上

translation.en: The original ones,
translation.zh: 最初的住户

translation.en: long before the Vayle family.
translation.zh: 远远早于维尔家族

translation.en: I… I'm going to go take a look. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我过去看看 谢谢

translation.en: -[Franny] He doesn't look like a cat. -[George] He does.
translation.zh: -他看起来不像猫 -多像啊

translation.en: -[Franny] His ears are so little. -[George] It's called Cat in the Hat.
translation.zh: -这本书叫《戴帽子的猫》 -他的耳朵好小

translation.en: -And his nose and stuff like that. -He's got a normal nose.
translation.zh: -还有他的鼻子之类的 长成那样 -他鼻子很正常

translation.en: [Franny giggles] But it's so little!
translation.zh: 但是好小啊！

translation.en: You know he killed someone?
translation.zh: 你知道他杀了人吗？

translation.en: Over a game of tennis.
translation.zh: 因为一场网球比赛

translation.en: Who? Caravaggio.
translation.zh: -谁？ -卡拉瓦乔

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm not surprised.
translation.zh: 这倒不意外

translation.en: People get away with all kinds of horrible things.
translation.zh: 人们做各种恐怖的事情 都能逃脱刑罚

translation.en: Are you speaking from personal experience?
translation.zh: 你这是个人经验？

translation.en: So are you studying art? I-I teach over at Saginaw.
translation.zh: 你学习艺术？我在塞基诺教课

translation.en: Oh God. No.
translation.zh: 天啊 不是吧

translation.en: No, I was just… looking for T-shirt ideas.
translation.zh: 我就是来找T恤的创意

translation.en: I'm all about literature in school. Which school?
translation.zh: -我在学校对文学最感兴趣 -哪个学校？

translation.en: Cornell.
translation.zh: 康奈尔

translation.en: Oh, that's quite a commute.
translation.zh: 离这里很远啊

translation.en: Just taking a little hiatus.
translation.zh: 我最近只想休息一下

translation.en: Riding for rich folk at Crow Hill Stables.
translation.zh: 在乌鸦山马场陪有钱人骑马

translation.en: Yeah, I know that place.
translation.zh: 我知道那个地方

translation.en: It's right next to the tennis club. I play there sometimes.
translation.zh: 就在网球俱乐部旁边 我有时候会在那里打网球

translation.en: Oh. Well, uh… I hope you're a better loser than Caravaggio.
translation.zh: 我希望你没有卡拉瓦乔糟糕

translation.en: George Claire.
translation.zh: 乔治·克莱尔

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Right. Claire.
translation.zh: 对啊 克莱尔

translation.en: Yeah, my friend Eddie does your yard work.
translation.zh: 对 我的朋友艾迪 在你那里整理院子

translation.en: I think your wife hired him.
translation.zh: 好像是你妻子雇了他

translation.en: Is that your little girl?
translation.zh: 那是你的女儿吗？

translation.en: Yeah, that's Franny.
translation.zh: 是的 她叫弗兰妮

translation.en: Hi there, Franny. How's that book?
translation.zh: 嗨 弗兰妮 这本书怎么样？

translation.en: What does this say?
translation.zh: 上面讲了什么？

translation.en: Let's see.
translation.zh: 我们来看看吧

translation.en: Okay, it says…
translation.zh: 好的 上面说…

translation.en: "He should not be here. He should not be about."
translation.zh: “他不应该在这里 他不应该来这里

translation.en: "He should not be here when your mother is out."
translation.zh: 你妈妈不在家的时候 他不应该在这里”

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Franny.
translation.zh: 见到你很高兴 弗兰妮

translation.en: [George] Okay, ready to go?
translation.zh: 好了 准备好走了吗？

translation.en: George?
translation.zh: 乔治？

translation.en: George?
translation.zh: 乔治？

translation.en: George, you're not going to believe the picture I just saw.
translation.zh: 你绝对无法相信我看到了什么照片

translation.en: -[Eddie] Wanna go to the pond? -[Franny] Yeah!
translation.zh: -你们想去池塘玩儿吗？ -想！

translation.en: [Eddie] You wanna go swim?
translation.zh: 你们想去游泳吗？

translation.en: -[Cole] Come on, Franny. Gonna catch you! -[Franny] No!
translation.zh: 走吧 弗兰妮 我要来抓你了！

translation.en: -[Cole] I'm gonna throw you in! -[Franny] No!
translation.zh: -我要把你扔进池塘里！ -不要！

translation.en: [Eddie] Hey Franny, watch out for the snapping turtles, okay?
translation.zh: 弗兰妮 小心鳄龟 好吗？

translation.en: All right? It's down my butt! It's got my butt!
translation.zh: 好吗？我的屁股！ 它咬住了我的屁股！

translation.en: -[Franny laughs] -Didn't they say summer's officially over?
translation.zh: 他们没说夏天正式结束了吗？

translation.en: Our seasons play by their own rules up here.
translation.zh: 我们这里的季节有自己的规则

translation.en: Who knows? It could snow tomorrow.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？说不定明天就会下雪

translation.en: Well, I brought some lemonade to help you guys cool off,
translation.zh: 我带了一点柠檬水 帮你们凉快一下

translation.en: but it looks like you're way ahead of me.
translation.zh: 但看来你们早就想办法凉快了

translation.en: You should come on in. The water's great.
translation.zh: 你也应该下来 水很棒

translation.en: Believe me,
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: it looks very tempting.
translation.zh: 看起来很诱人

translation.en: You know what they say about temptation. Easiest way to kill it's just to give in.
translation.zh: 你知道大家是怎样说诱惑的 扼杀诱惑最好的办法是屈服

translation.en: [Catherine] So what does your uncle do?
translation.zh: 你舅舅是做什么的？

translation.en: He's a hearse driver.
translation.zh: 他是灵车司机

translation.en: I guess every town needs one of those.
translation.zh: 应该每个小镇都需要一位灵车司机

translation.en: Can I ask about your parents?
translation.zh: 你的父母呢？

translation.en: Um… both dead. Car accident.
translation.zh: 都死了 车祸

translation.en: Oh God, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 天啊 我太抱歉了

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, it was something.
translation.zh: 哎 倒是有一点好处

translation.en: It makes a kid grow up fast.
translation.zh: 能让孩子快速成长

translation.en: Cole's on good track for college, though.
translation.zh: 科尔应该能上大学

translation.en: And what about you?
translation.zh: 那你呢？

translation.en: Nah, that stuff's not really in my cards.
translation.zh: 学习什么的 我真的不太行

translation.en: I mean, I did want to study music…
translation.zh: 我以前确实想学音乐…

translation.en: -Really? What instruments do you play? -…but…
translation.zh: 真的吗？你演奏什么乐器？

translation.en: All kinds. I-- I have a beat-up guitar right now.
translation.zh: 各种乐器 我现在有一个旧吉他

translation.en: We have a piano at the house. I just got it tuned.
translation.zh: 我们有一架钢琴 我刚调好音

translation.en: It'd be nice to have someone who can actually play it. I'm pathetic.
translation.zh: 如果有人能弹奏 那就太好了 我弹得很烂

translation.en: [chuckles] All right. Well, thanks, Mrs. Claire.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢你 克莱尔太太

translation.en: -Catherine. Sorry. -It's okay.
translation.zh: -凯瑟琳 抱歉 -没事

translation.en: You'll get used to it.
translation.zh: 你会习惯的

translation.en: -[students laughing] -Yeah. Please do not tell him I said that.
translation.zh: 请你们别告诉他是我说的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay, so, the Hudson River School painters.
translation.zh: 哈德逊河画派

translation.en: Landscapes as the realm of the soul.
translation.zh: 风景是灵魂的国度

translation.en: If you keep reading around the subject, you'll find it really rewarding. Really.
translation.zh: 如果你们一直阅读这个主题的作品 会发现它真的很有意义

translation.en: -Keep going, okay? -Thank you so much.
translation.zh: -继续 好吗？ -非常感谢

translation.en: -We will. -Bye!
translation.zh: -我们会读的 -再见！

translation.en: George Claire?
translation.zh: 乔治·克莱尔？

translation.en: Yes. Hello. Can I help you?
translation.zh: 是的 你好 有什么事吗？

translation.en: Justine Sokolov. Adjunct weaving instructor.
translation.zh: 贾丝廷·索科洛夫 兼职编织课讲师

translation.en: You play tennis with my husband Bram.
translation.zh: 你和我丈夫布拉姆一起玩网球

translation.en: Bram?
translation.zh: 布拉姆？

translation.en: Oh, Bram, of course. Yes. He mentioned that his wife teaches here.
translation.zh: 布拉姆 哦 对 他提过 他妻子在这里教课

translation.en: I hear you've developed a cult-like following already in our department.
translation.zh: 我听说你在我们系 已经有了一群狂热的追随者

translation.en: So I… Oh, this you?
translation.zh: 所以我… 这是你的办公室吗？

translation.en: I thought I'd invite you and your wife over and see what all the fuss is about.
translation.zh: 我考虑邀请你和你妻子过来 看看到底是怎么回事

translation.en: That sounds really nice. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: You know, it'd be nice for my wife to meet a few more Saginaw folk, too, so yeah.
translation.zh: 让我妻子 多见几个塞基诺的同事也不错 好啊

translation.en: Excellent. I have your number in the registry,
translation.zh: 太好了 教务处有你家电话

translation.en: so I'll give the missus a call.
translation.zh: 我到时候给你老婆打电话

translation.en: -Fantastic. -George Claire.
translation.zh: -非常好 -乔治·克莱尔

translation.en: Wow. You painted these?
translation.zh: 这些是你画的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, a long time ago.
translation.zh: 是的 很久之前画的

translation.en: I gave up the whole fine arts thing to focus on theory.
translation.zh: 我放弃了实用美术 专攻理论部分

translation.en: Realized I wasn't really up to snuff.
translation.zh: 意识到我自己真的不够格

translation.en: I disagree.
translation.zh: 我不这样认为

translation.en: These are confidently executed, and they are… quite unique.
translation.zh: 这些画作完成得非常好 而且都非常独特

translation.en: Thank you. Uh, you should see my wife's stuff. She's the real artist of the family.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你应该看看我妻子的画作 她才是我们家真正的艺术家

translation.en: Okay, I look forward to it. I'll be in touch, George Claire.
translation.zh: 好的 我很期待欣赏她的画作 我们回头联系 乔治·克莱尔

translation.en: [groans] What's wrong? That smell. It's-- it's getting stronger.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -那个气味越来越强烈了

translation.en: Yeah, I figured it out. It's 'cause we're above the garage.
translation.zh: 是的 我搞清楚了 那是因为我们就在车库的上面

translation.en: I'll get some fans and air it out in the morning.
translation.zh: 我明天早上去找些风扇 把气味吹出去

translation.en: But why does it come and go?
translation.zh: 但为什么气味会时有时无的？

translation.en: Cath, please stop with the ghost stuff.
translation.zh: 凯瑟 别再想那些鬼魂的事情了

translation.en: I'm not gonna let you put a negative spin on this house.
translation.zh: 我不会让你对这栋房子 有任何负面想法的

translation.en: -[Franny screams] Mommy, where are you? -[gasps]
translation.zh: 妈妈 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Mommy, I'm scared, I'm scared! -Mommy! -Hey, hey! Shh.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我怕！

translation.en: -What happened? -What is going on? Where were you?
translation.zh: -发生什么了？ -到底怎么回事？你去哪里了？

translation.en: -What happened? Tell me. -I saw the lady, Mommy. I'm scared.
translation.zh: -告诉我怎么回事 -我看见了一个女人 妈妈 我害怕

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 没关系 别害怕

translation.en: -Mommy's here. You can sleep with us. -Oh God. Cath, again?
translation.zh: 妈妈在这儿呢 你可以和我们一起睡 凯瑟 又一起睡？

translation.en: If we filled out her sedative prescription like the pediatrician said,
translation.zh: 如果我们像儿科医生说的那样 给她开一些镇静剂

translation.en: this wouldn't keep happening.
translation.zh: 这种情况就不会一直发生了

translation.en: I said to you ten times I don't feel good giving her unnecessary medications.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过很多次 给她开一些不必要的药物 我觉得不好

translation.en: It's this house.
translation.zh: 是这栋房子的问题

translation.en: Oh God. You two sleep in there. I'll take Franny's room.
translation.zh: 你们两个睡在这里 我去弗兰妮的房间睡

translation.en: Daddy's mad at me.
translation.zh: 爸爸生我的气了

translation.en: [gasps] No! No, no, no, he's not.
translation.zh: 没有 他没有

translation.en: No, sweetheart. Not at you.
translation.zh: 没有 宝贝 他不是生你的气

translation.en: [Eddie] It's gotta feel good.
translation.zh: 感觉一定非常棒

translation.en: I guess, yeah.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: Uh, guess who I ran into the other day?
translation.zh: 猜猜我那天碰到了谁？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Your boss, George Claire.
translation.zh: 你的老板 乔治·克莱尔

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是嘛？ -是

translation.en: I haven't met the guy officially yet. What's he like?
translation.zh: 我还没有正式见过那个人 他什么样？

translation.en: Dishonest.
translation.zh: 不诚实

translation.en: Deceitful.
translation.zh: 骗子

translation.en: [chuckles] How would you know that?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Because I found him attractive.
translation.zh: 因为我发现他很有吸引力

translation.en: [Cole] Here we go!
translation.zh: 我们来了！

translation.en: You wanna watch Eddie chop wood?
translation.zh: 你想看艾迪砍木头吗？

translation.en: [Franny] Yeah!
translation.zh: 想！

translation.en: Chop.
translation.zh: 砍

translation.en: Chop.
translation.zh: 砍

translation.en: Chop.
translation.zh: 砍

translation.en: "All of us on Earth are associated
translation.zh: “我们地球上的所有人

translation.en: with those in the spiritual world who are like ourselves."
translation.zh: 都与那些灵魂世界中 和我们相似的人有关联

translation.en: "We are, in a sense, united to them."
translation.zh: 我们从某种意义上说 和他们是一致的”

translation.en: [ghostly voice] United to them…
translation.zh: 一致的

translation.en: -[chopping wood continues] -[Catherine] What do you want?
translation.zh: 你想怎样？

translation.en: What are you looking for here?
translation.zh: 你在这里找什么呢？

translation.en: [chuckling] I… I don't really know.
translation.zh: 我其实也不知道

translation.en: You're a presumptuous fucker, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你是个自负的混蛋 不是吗？

translation.en: If you're coming in, shut the door behind you.
translation.zh: 如果你进来 就关上身后的门

translation.en: He's got a social life at that school, and I'm isolated.
translation.zh: 他在那个学校有社交生活 而我却是与世隔绝的

translation.en: [woman] Something's wrong. I can hear it in your voice.
translation.zh: 出什么事了 我能从你的声音中听出来

translation.en: I…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I'm starting… to see things.
translation.zh: 我开始看见一些东西了

translation.en: And I'm scared to tell George about it.
translation.zh: 我不敢告诉乔治这件事

translation.en: -Catherine, have you been eating? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳 你最近吃饭了吗？

translation.en: What's the church like up there? Have you prayed on any of this?
translation.zh: 那边的教会怎么样？ 你在哪个教会祈祷了吗？

translation.en: Try to remember how he did right by marrying--
translation.zh: 要记得他做得非常对 结婚…

translation.en: Oh, I gotta go. Thanks a lot for the pep talk, Mom. I love you.
translation.zh: 我得挂了 谢谢你鼓励我 妈妈 我爱你

translation.en: [Catherine] That was some run.
translation.zh: 你出去跑了这么久

translation.en: Yeah, I guess I went pretty far. I don't know what came over me.
translation.zh: 是啊 看来是我跑太远了 我真不知道自己是怎么了

translation.en: And then I-I got distracted by these wildflowers.
translation.zh: 然后这些野花让我分心了

translation.en: Thanks, but now you're going to be late for class.
translation.zh: 谢谢 但是现在你上课要迟到了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know. I-I'd better hustle.
translation.zh: 是 我知道 我最好快点了

translation.en: [Cole] Look who's home.
translation.zh: 看看谁回家了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: -[Cole] What are you doing? -One sec.
translation.zh: -你在做什么？ -等一下

translation.en: Mr. Claire, right?
translation.zh: 克莱尔先生 对吧？

translation.en: It's nice to finally meet you. I'm Eddie.
translation.zh: 很高兴终于见到你了 我是艾迪

translation.en: -My brother and I are about to get-- -The Vayle boys, aren't you?
translation.zh: -我和我弟弟正要来刷底漆… -你们是维尔兄弟 是吧？

translation.en: Not anymore, sir.
translation.zh: 已经不是了 先生

translation.en: We go by Lucks now. Took our uncle's last name.
translation.zh: 我们现在姓拉克斯 跟了我舅舅的姓氏

translation.en: Do me a favor. My… my wife doesn't know that you lived here. Uh, or what happened.
translation.zh: 帮我个忙 我妻子不知道 你以前住这里 也不知道发生过什么

translation.en: I think it would be better if we kept it that way.
translation.zh: 我们最好继续保守这个秘密

translation.en: Uh, she's a nervous woman and, uh…
translation.zh: 她是很容易紧张的女人…

translation.en: well, she wouldn't want you around if she found out.
translation.zh: 如果她发现了 就不会让你来了

translation.en: Sure, Mr. Claire.
translation.zh: 没问题 克莱尔先生

translation.en: My brother and I are only here for honest work.
translation.zh: 我和我弟弟是来这里诚信工作的

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我很感激

translation.en: It seems a… little odd, no?
translation.zh: 似乎有点奇怪 不是吗？

translation.en: That you'd want to be here at all.
translation.zh: 你居然还想要到这里来

translation.en: Taking care of this house comes second nature to us.
translation.zh: 照顾这栋房子 我们已经非常熟悉 自然而然了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Did you meet your husband in art school?
translation.zh: 你是在艺术学校认识你丈夫的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we were undergrads together.
translation.zh: 对 我们本科是同学

translation.en: That's cool.
translation.zh: 好棒

translation.en: [Catherine] Were your parents supportive of you studying music?
translation.zh: 你父母当初支持你学习音乐吗？

translation.en: Yeah, my mom was the one who taught me.
translation.zh: 对 就是我妈妈教我的

translation.en: But when my father found my application, he, uh… he beat me with a two-by-four.
translation.zh: 但是我爸爸发现我的入学申请之后 用木棒打了我

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 你说真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yeah, he actually bloodied me up pretty good.
translation.zh: 把我打得血光淋淋

translation.en: Well, if you decide to reapply to music school,
translation.zh: 如果你决定重新申请音乐学校

translation.en: I will personally write you a check for your application.
translation.zh: 我个人非常愿意给你写一张支票 帮你支付申请费用

translation.en: You really got me.
translation.zh: 你真的抓到了我的神韵

translation.en: -Hey, George. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 嗨 乔治

translation.en: Eddie-- Eddie was just playing his favorite Louis Armstrong song for me.
translation.zh: 艾迪刚才为我弹奏他最喜欢的 路易斯·阿姆斯特朗歌曲

translation.en: -Called-- What's it called? -"Someday You'll Be Sorry."
translation.zh: -叫什么来着？ -《你终有一天会后悔》

translation.en: [chuckling] That's right. That's the story of my life.
translation.zh: 对 那就是我的人生

translation.en: What a surprise.
translation.zh: 真是意外

translation.en: Eddie was telling me earlier how he was here for honest work.
translation.zh: 艾迪之前还说 他来这里是诚信工作

translation.en: I-- I didn't realize that it included entertainment.
translation.zh: 我不知道工作还包含娱乐

translation.en: We finished painting, sir,
translation.zh: 我们粉刷完了 先生

translation.en: and, uh, Mrs. Claire asked me to play something before I left.
translation.zh: 克莱尔太太让我走之前弹奏一曲

translation.en: -So-- -Wait, Eddie, Eddie.
translation.zh: -所以… -等一下 艾迪

translation.en: Come on, please. Don't stop on my account.
translation.zh: 继续吧 不要因为我停止

translation.en: I've been called many things before, but never a party pooper.
translation.zh: 别人给过我很多称呼 但是从来没有人说我是派对的扫兴者

translation.en: Well, the man of the house has spoken,
translation.zh: 一家之主都发话了

translation.en: so finish the goddamn song, Eddie.
translation.zh: 所以弹完这首该死的曲子 艾迪

translation.en: Yeah, please.
translation.zh: 是啊 请吧

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: Oh God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[ghostly voice] Catherine. -[gasps, gags]
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳

translation.en: [George] What you do to me, you do not know.
translation.zh: 你对我做了什么 你根本不知道

translation.en: My God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: I've never done anything like this before, you know.
translation.zh: 我以前从来没有做过这种事 你知道吗？

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 喂 怎么了？

translation.en: What? I'm just talking.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我只是在聊天啊

translation.en: -Sharing. -What the fuck is wrong with me?
translation.zh: -分享 -我到底怎么了？

translation.en: -Why do I keep doing this? -Hey, Willis, I'm being serious.
translation.zh: -我为什么一直做这种事？ -维利斯 我是认真的

translation.en: It'd be nice to know you a bit better.
translation.zh: 多了解你一点 感觉会很好

translation.en: Some ordinary, regular things.
translation.zh: 一些普通、平常的事情

translation.en: That's not what this is about.
translation.zh: 我们之间的关系不合适

translation.en: Ow! What the hell?
translation.zh: 什么鬼？

translation.en: You think because I fuck you, I'm fooled by you?
translation.zh: 你以为我睡了你 就是被你耍了？

translation.en: I've been around guys like you my whole life.
translation.zh: 我一辈子身边都是你这种人

translation.en: -What the hell are you talking about? -My dad made a fortune defending them.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？ -我爸爸给他们辩护 赚了不少钱

translation.en: Thieves, con men, psychopaths.
translation.zh: 小偷、骗子、精神病

translation.en: And they all got off because that's the way the world works for men.
translation.zh: 他们都脱罪了 因为这个世界中 男人就是能为所欲为

translation.en: Okay, look, I see that you have some pretty awful ideas about men.
translation.zh: 好了 我明白你对男人的印象不好

translation.en: I have awful ideas about everything.
translation.zh: 我对一切都印象不好

translation.en: Now get the fuck up.
translation.zh: 立刻给我起来

translation.en: -Come on, Willis. -No.
translation.zh: -别这样 维利斯 -不行

translation.en: I'm done with this.
translation.zh: 我受够了

translation.en: Willis! Willis!
translation.zh: 维利斯！

translation.en: Willis!
translation.zh: 维利斯！

translation.en: -[Justine] Hi! -Trick or treat?
translation.zh: -嗨！ -给糖还是捣蛋？

translation.en: -Come in, come in. -Hello, I'm Catherine.
translation.zh: -请进 -你好 我是凯瑟琳

translation.en: -Oh, of course you are. Mmm. -Oh.
translation.zh: 你当然是了

translation.en: [chuckles] George, hi.
translation.zh: 乔治 嗨

translation.en: -Hi. For you. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -给你的 -谢谢

translation.en: Bram, where are you? The Claires have arrived.
translation.zh: 布拉姆 亲爱的 你在哪儿？ 克莱尔夫妇来了

translation.en: -Wow. -[Bram] I'm here.
translation.zh: 布拉姆 亲爱的 你在哪儿？ 克莱尔夫妇来了 -我来了 -太好了

translation.en: [George] Amazing.
translation.zh: -我来了 -太好了

translation.en: -[Justine] Thanks. -Hello.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -你好

translation.en: -I'm Catherine. -Hey, Bram.
translation.zh: -我是凯瑟琳 -嗨 我是布拉姆

translation.en: -Thanks for having us. -Look what they brought us.
translation.zh: -谢谢你招待我们 -看看他们给我们带来了什么

translation.en: -Thank you. How are you? -Very well.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 乔治 你过得好吗？ -很好

translation.en: -Come on in. -Beautiful.
translation.zh: 这个真的非常漂亮

translation.en: -Thank you. -I love your artwork.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -我很喜欢你的艺术作品

translation.en: Ah. Well, yes. We're just enjoying our tenure here while it lasts.
translation.zh: 只要我们还住在这里就好好享用

translation.en: -Oh, do you rent? -No, no, no.
translation.zh: -你们的房子是租来的吗？ -不是

translation.en: [laughing] He just means how these old Hudson Valley homes are.
translation.zh: 他是在说 这些哈德逊谷的房子就是这样

translation.en: We think we own them, we're just caretakers.
translation.zh: 我们以为拥有它们 但其实我们只是照顾它们

translation.en: [laughing] They outlive us all.
translation.zh: 我们以为拥有它们 但其实我们只是照顾它们 它们比我们活得都长

translation.en: My wife thinks ours is haunted.
translation.zh: 我妻子觉得我们家房子闹鬼了

translation.en: -Well, she's probably right. -[laughs] They're all haunted a bit.
translation.zh: 说不定她是对的 这种房子都有点闹鬼

translation.en: After all, we're in Headless Horseman country.
translation.zh: 毕竟我们是在 《无头骑士》发生的国家

translation.en: [laughs] Let me take your coats.
translation.zh: 我来拿你的大衣

translation.en: Oh, actually, we should go outside and look at the alpacas before they nap.
translation.zh: 其实我们应该出去看看那些羊驼 不然一会儿它们要打瞌睡了

translation.en: -Oh, yes. -This way.
translation.zh: -好 -这边请

translation.en: -You'll love it. -Alpacas nap?
translation.zh: -你们会喜欢的 -羊驼会打瞌睡？

translation.en: Where does one buy such quality weed up here?
translation.zh: 这里哪儿能买到质量这么好的大麻？

translation.en: -[Bram] Buy? I grow it. -[George] Nice.
translation.zh: -我种的 -厉害

translation.en: You know, I came up here to write the Great American Novel, but…
translation.zh: 其实 我来这里 是想写伟大美国小说 但是…

translation.en: I spend most of my time tending to my garden, if you get my drift.
translation.zh: 我的多数时间都用在了打理花园上 你应该懂我吧

translation.en: I love your setup. It's amazing.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这里的布局 好漂亮

translation.en: -Aww, thank you. -And your work is so unique.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -你的作品太独特了

translation.en: Thanks. It's gonna sound a little strange,
translation.zh: 谢谢 这话听起来可能有些奇怪

translation.en: but it's a spiritual thing for me, weaving.
translation.zh: 但编织对我来说是一种精神上的东西

translation.en: I tap into something cosmic when I'm working.
translation.zh: 我工作的时候会利用一下宇宙

translation.en: -Its patterns, you know? -Yeah. Sometimes I feel guilty taking credit for it.
translation.zh: 这种图案 你懂吧？有时候 我说这是自己创作的 都不太好意思

translation.en: Why? You shouldn't.
translation.zh: 为什么？你不用不好意思啊

translation.en: I would love for you to make something for my Franny.
translation.zh: 我希望你可以为弗兰妮织点什么

translation.en: -I'd pay you, naturally. -Don't be silly. I'll do it for cost.
translation.zh: -我自然会付钱给你的 -别傻了 我只收成本价

translation.en: Oh, actually, George already asked for a scarf for his mother,
translation.zh: 事实上 乔治已经为他的妈妈 订了一条围巾

translation.en: so I'll just add it to that order.
translation.zh: 所以我会直接加在这个订单上

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -You guys just have the one child? -Yeah. Yes.
translation.zh: -你们只生了一个孩子吗？ -是的

translation.en: She's four. And you and Bram? Do you guys have kids?
translation.zh: 她四岁了 你和布拉姆呢？ 你们有孩子吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Bram and I were conflicted about that for a while,
translation.zh: 布拉姆和我因为这个 有一段时间总是产生矛盾

translation.en: and then Mother Nature made the final decision.
translation.zh: 大自然做了最后的决定

translation.en: And she made the right one.
translation.zh: 它做了正确的决定

translation.en: It all worked out perfectly.
translation.zh: 一切都完美解决

translation.en: I was conflicted, too, but just like that, it…
translation.zh: 我之前也很矛盾 但是就那样…

translation.en: It happened.
translation.zh: 就那样发生了

translation.en: And then we got married, which I was also conflicted about.
translation.zh: 然后我们结婚了 这一点我还是很矛盾

translation.en: I guess you could say I'm a conflicted Catholic girl at heart,
translation.zh: 我内心应该就是那种 矛盾的天主教女孩吧

translation.en: dutifully going through the motions.
translation.zh: 像完成任务一样走人生的各个阶段

translation.en: You know,
translation.zh: 其实

translation.en: the first few years of our marriage
translation.zh: 我们婚姻的前几年

translation.en: were a complete blur because of the baby and school.
translation.zh: 因为宝宝和学校的问题 完全是一团糟

translation.en: We're really still trying to catch our breath up here.
translation.zh: 我们到现在依然还没有喘过气来

translation.en: You know, I attend this women's group.
translation.zh: 其实我参加了一个女性团体

translation.en: It's an Arts Club… thing.
translation.zh: 算是一个艺术俱乐部…那种

translation.en: We meet once a month up in Albany,
translation.zh: 我们每个月在奥尔巴尼见一次

translation.en: and there are so many creative ladies to meet, Catherine.
translation.zh: 那里有好多 有创意的女性可以认识 凯瑟琳

translation.en: I think you should come with me.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该跟我去看看

translation.en: I would love something like that.
translation.zh: 我很愿意去

translation.en: I don't know anybody up here.
translation.zh: 我在这里谁都不认识

translation.en: Well, you do now.
translation.zh: 你现在认识了

translation.en: It must be so nice
translation.zh: 继承一笔财产

translation.en: to inherit a fortune
translation.zh: 不用整天写书

translation.en: and then spend all day not writing a book.
translation.zh: 一定很美好

translation.en: I really like them, especially her. She's so interesting.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢他们 尤其是女主人 她真的好有趣

translation.en: She's so free with herself and her body.
translation.zh: 她的精神和她的身体都好自由

translation.en: She can certainly put away some lasagna.
translation.zh: 她当然可以大吃千层面

translation.en: -That's a nasty thing to say. -Come on, I'm kidding.
translation.zh: -你这样说就不好了 -不至于吧 我开玩笑的

translation.en: I like them, too.
translation.zh: 我也很喜欢他们

translation.en: I especially like…
translation.zh: 我尤其喜欢…

translation.en: [sniffs] …Bram's weed.
translation.zh: 布拉姆的大麻

translation.en: Are you sure you're okay to drive after smoking so much?
translation.zh: 你确定你抽了那么多之后 还能开车吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 能

translation.en: -I'm fine. I'm more than okay. -Really?
translation.zh: -我很好 我好得不行 -真的吗？

translation.en: -Watch this. -[engine accelerating]
translation.zh: 瞧好了

translation.en: George, slow down.
translation.zh: 乔治 开慢一点

translation.en: -Slow down, George. -Really? -Really? -George, slow down!
translation.zh: -开慢点 乔治 -真的吗？

translation.en: [yelling] Slow down!
translation.zh: 开慢一点！

translation.en: -[Catherine] Stop, George! -[George] Whoo!
translation.zh: 停车 乔治！

translation.en: God, what the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 天啊 你在做什么？

translation.en: What? What, I'm just having a little fun.
translation.zh: 什么？我只是觉得这样很好玩

translation.en: You remember what that was like, Cath, huh?
translation.zh: 你还记得那是什么感觉吗 凯瑟？

translation.en: -That's not funny! -[laughing] Come on.
translation.zh: -一点都不好玩 -别这样嘛

translation.en: Oh, come on, Cath. Cath!
translation.zh: 不是吧 凯瑟

translation.en: Catherine!
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: Cath, where are you going? Come on, get back in the car.
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳 你要去哪儿？ 拜托 坐回车上吧

translation.en: -Cath! -Get your hands off me!
translation.zh: -凯瑟！ -把你的手拿开！

translation.en: God, we are two smart people.
translation.zh: 我们两个都是聪明人

translation.en: -We should've known better. -Known what?
translation.zh: -我们早就应该知道的 -知道什么？

translation.en: That I'm only here for the imaginary book jacket bio
translation.zh: 我来到这里 只是为了你脑中构想的那个

translation.en: that you have in your fucking head.
translation.zh: 封皮简介

translation.en: The-- the-- the professor with the wife and the country home.
translation.zh: 教授和妻子 还有他们乡下的家

translation.en: I gave up everything for you!
translation.zh: 我为了你 放弃了一切！

translation.en: Oh God, I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry I fucked up both of our lives!
translation.zh: 天啊 真抱歉 我毁掉了我们两个的人生！

translation.en: And the worst part is this is all I have.
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是 我拥有的就只有这个了

translation.en: Cath, you know what you do have? Is the crying drunks.
translation.zh: 凯瑟 你知道你拥有什么吗？ 喝醉酒大哭

translation.en: You are a person who should not drink alcohol,
translation.zh: 你这种人不应该喝酒

translation.en: especially when you do not fucking eat anything!
translation.zh: 尤其是你他妈什么都没吃

translation.en: Oh my God. I am so sick of everybody blaming everything
translation.zh: 天啊 我真的受够了 因为我不吃东西

translation.en: in my fucking life on me not eating!
translation.zh: 每个人都在责怪 我这该死人生中的一切

translation.en: Please, get back in the goddamn car!
translation.zh: 请你回到该死的车上

translation.en: -Get off of me! -[cries out] Ow!
translation.zh: 放开我！

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 靠！

translation.en: -[groans] -Oh my God. Cath?
translation.zh: 天啊 凯瑟？

translation.en: Oh my God. Cath…
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. Was that…
translation.zh: 我太抱歉 我刚才…

translation.en: Did I… Did I…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: Cath?
translation.zh: 凯瑟？

translation.en: Cath, are you okay?
translation.zh: 凯瑟 你没事吧？

translation.en: Come on, Cole. Get up. I'll drive you home.
translation.zh: 走吧 科尔 起来 我开车送你回家

translation.en: [George] Hey, Cath?
translation.zh: 嗨 凯瑟？

translation.en: I didn't mean to hurt you.
translation.zh: 我没想伤害你

translation.en: I would never hurt you.
translation.zh: 我永远都不会伤害你

translation.en: But I also…
translation.zh: 但我也…

translation.en: I have not been sensitive to your needs for some time.
translation.zh: 我确实很久没有顾及你的需求了

translation.en: And for that, I owe you an apology.
translation.zh: 为此 我欠你一句道歉

translation.en: More than an apology.
translation.zh: 不只一句道歉

translation.en: One thing I do know…
translation.zh: 有一件事 我很确定

translation.en: [voice breaks] …is I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: -[glass shatters] -[Franny] What was that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Oh God. Jesus. What?
translation.zh: 天啊 什么？

translation.en: [Catherine] It's okay, baby.
translation.zh: 没事的 宝贝

translation.en: [whispering] Nothing happened. It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 什么事都没发生 没事

translation.en: [woman] "We look at each other, and we are not ashamed."
translation.zh: “我们看着彼此 并不羞愧

translation.en: "I wearing the face of the proper marriage,
translation.zh: 我戴着美满婚姻的面具

translation.en: you the face of the independent woman."
translation.zh: 而你是独立女性的面具

translation.en: "We cleaved to each other across that space."
translation.zh: 我们在那个空间里紧挨彼此”

translation.en: [George] You're back later than I thought. Am I?
translation.zh: -我没想到你回家这么晚 -是吗？

translation.en: The fridge is empty.
translation.zh: 冰箱空了

translation.en: I can go out, pick up some food for us.
translation.zh: 我可以出去买点吃的

translation.en: -What do you feel like? -I, uh… I ate with Justine.
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？ -我和贾丝廷吃过了

translation.en: [George] Brilliant setting for a faculty meeting, Floyd.
translation.zh: （塞基诺学院 下船坡道） 弗洛伊德 教师会议这样进行 真惬意

translation.en: [Floyd] Yes. I take her out alone a lot, which would seem selfish.
translation.zh: 是啊 我总是一个人开船航行 那样看起来有点自私

translation.en: I used to sail a bit myself. Grew up on the Connecticut coast.
translation.zh: 我以前自己也航行 我是在康涅狄格州海岸边长大的

translation.en: Oh, that's right. Do your family own a boat?
translation.zh: 这样啊 你家有船吗？

translation.en: I inherited my cousin's. The Lost Horizon.
translation.zh: 我继承了表哥的船 消失的地平线号

translation.en: He actually drowned while sailing it.
translation.zh: 他其实是航行的时候溺水了

translation.en: Oh, how sad.
translation.zh: 真伤心

translation.en: Yeah. Only 19.
translation.zh: 是啊 才19岁

translation.en: -Mm. -Already so sophisticated.
translation.zh: 已经非常老练了

translation.en: I remember when he died.
translation.zh: 我还记得他死的时候

translation.en: I stole his diary after the funeral. Read it repeatedly.
translation.zh: 我在葬礼之后偷了他的日记 一遍一遍反复读

translation.en: I know it's-- it's an awful thing to do,
translation.zh: 我知道这样做很恶劣

translation.en: but I… I think I needed some sort of… connection.
translation.zh: 但我想 我需要和他有一点联系

translation.en: Did you learn anything from it?
translation.zh: 从日记中了解到什么了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, a little.
translation.zh: 是啊 有一点

translation.en: He was gay, unhappy.
translation.zh: 他是同性恋 一直不开心

translation.en: Typical tortured artist.
translation.zh: 典型的那种精神饱受折磨的艺术家

translation.en: And then all that angst
translation.zh: 后来 所有的忧虑

translation.en: one unfortunate moment vanishes forever.
translation.zh: 都在那不幸的一瞬间永远消失了

translation.en: We're all so inconsequential, Floyd.
translation.zh: 我们都是这么微不足道 弗洛伊德

translation.en: Swedenborg would suggest otherwise.
translation.zh: 史威登堡可不这样认为

translation.en: He'd say death is only the beginning.
translation.zh: 他会说 死亡只是开始

translation.en: Have you read the book yet?
translation.zh: 那本书你读了吗？

translation.en: [George] It's on the top of my list.
translation.zh: 在我阅读清单最前面

translation.en: -[George] Come, come in. -Ahh. Cath?
translation.zh: 请进 凯瑟？

translation.en: Let me get that.
translation.zh: 我来吧

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Oh, Catherine, this is Floyd DeBeers, head of our department.
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳 这是弗洛伊德·德比尔斯 我们的系主任

translation.en: He also took me on this magnificent boat ride.
translation.zh: 他带我进行了一次壮丽的航船之旅

translation.en: So good to meet you.
translation.zh: 幸会

translation.en: So, in return, I invited him to our house, a very unfair trade.
translation.zh: 于是作为回报 我邀请他到我们家 这交易非常不公平

translation.en: -I've heard wonderful things about you. -As I have you.
translation.zh: -久仰大名 -彼此彼此

translation.en: George, is this some kind of setup?
translation.zh: 乔治 这是安排好的吗？

translation.en: [Catherine chuckles] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [chuckling] I-- I swear to God, I didn't even tell her you were coming.
translation.zh: 我对上帝发誓 我都没有告诉她你要来

translation.en: You see, George? You see? There are no coincidences.
translation.zh: 你看到了吗 乔治？这不是巧合

translation.en: I'm sorry. I-- I was taken by the artwork and just started reading it.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 我被这幅画作迷住了 然后就开始阅读这本书

translation.en: [George] Nothing to be sorry for.
translation.zh: 不用觉得抱歉

translation.en: You do know what this is, don't you? The cover art?
translation.zh: 你知道这是什么吧？封面的这幅画？

translation.en: It's a soul transitioning into the afterlife.
translation.zh: 这是一个灵魂转化到来世的作品

translation.en: [Catherine] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: [Floyd] The painter followed Swedenborg,
translation.zh: 这位画家追随史威登堡

translation.en: so he believed that death is parallel to birth, but divine.
translation.zh: 所以他相信 死亡和出生类似 但却是神圣的

translation.en: [George] Floyd, believe me.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德 相信我

translation.en: You do not want to get my wife started on all that, uh, stuff.
translation.zh: 你肯定不想让我妻子接触这些

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] Uh, Cath, please show Floyd around.
translation.zh: 凯瑟 你带弗洛伊德转转吧

translation.en: Um, I'm gonna fix us some cocktails.
translation.zh: 我去弄点鸡尾酒

translation.en: May I show you around?
translation.zh: 我带你转转吧？

translation.en: -I can't wait. -Great.
translation.zh: -非常期待 -好

translation.en: My daughter's asleep already,
translation.zh: 我女儿已经睡了

translation.en: but you can-- we can peek in her room.
translation.zh: 但我们可以看一眼她的房间

translation.en: We actually have four bedrooms, but we only use two of them.
translation.zh: 我们这里有四间卧室 但我们只用其中两间

translation.en: A young couple can't have too many bed--
translation.zh: 年轻的夫妻不能拥有太多床…

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: [whispering] We're not alone, are we?
translation.zh: 这里不只有我们 是吧？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: She doesn't mean any harm.
translation.zh: 她没有恶意

translation.en: She has reasons for lingering.
translation.zh: 她徘徊人间是有原因的

translation.en: [whispering] I've seen her, and so has my daughter.
translation.zh: 我见过她 我女儿也见过

translation.en: Because she's here for you.
translation.zh: 因为她是来支持你的

translation.en: -She wants you to know that. -[cries]
translation.zh: 她想让你知道这一点

translation.en: At first, I was terrified,
translation.zh: 最开始 我很害怕

translation.en: of course, but now…
translation.zh: 我当然会害怕了 但是现在…

translation.en: every time I sense her, I-- I feel…
translation.zh: 每次我察觉到她 我都感觉…

translation.en: comfort.
translation.zh: 慰藉

translation.en: -I know that doesn't make any sense. -It makes perfect sense.
translation.zh: -我知道这看似不合理 -很合理

translation.en: Her name is Smit, wife of Jacob Smit.
translation.zh: 她的名字叫斯密特 贾格布·斯密特的妻子

translation.en: He was a… um, a local minister.
translation.zh: 他以前是当地的牧师

translation.en: They built this house, and that's all I can find at the library.
translation.zh: 他们建造了这栋房子 我在图书馆只能找到这些信息了

translation.en: Let me do some digging on campus.
translation.zh: 我去学校找找

translation.en: You can't tell George because he can't know.
translation.zh: 你不能告诉乔治 他不能知道

translation.en: He thinks that I'm crazy.
translation.zh: 他以为我疯了

translation.en: No, of course not.
translation.zh: 不会 当然不会的

translation.en: He's just afraid, you know.
translation.zh: 他只是害怕 你要知道

translation.en: Men at his stage of life often are.
translation.zh: 处于他这个人生阶段的男人常会如此

translation.en: But try and be patient, Catherine.
translation.zh: 耐心点尝试 凯瑟琳

translation.en: With love, he can catch up to you spiritually.
translation.zh: 用爱感化他 他对精神世界的理解 就能跟上你的脚步

translation.en: And let us…
translation.zh: 让我们…

translation.en: Let us hold a séance here.
translation.zh: 我们可以在这里举行降神会

translation.en: -With or without George. -Really?
translation.zh: -不管有没有乔治 -真的吗？

translation.en: We can find out a little more about your housemate.
translation.zh: 我们可以多了解一点你这个室友

translation.en: [George] Bye, Floyd.
translation.zh: 再见 弗洛伊德

translation.en: Good night, good night, and thanks for a wonderful evening.
translation.zh: 晚安 谢谢你 让我度过一个美好的夜晚

translation.en: [George] Drive safe.
translation.zh: 开车小心

translation.en: My God, Cath, he absolutely adored you.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 凯瑟 他非常崇拜你

translation.en: I-- I have never seen Floyd light up like that around anyone.
translation.zh: 我从没见过弗洛伊德在别人身边 这么开心过

translation.en: And you were up there awhile. Did he say anything?
translation.zh: 你们在那里待了一会 他说什么了吗？

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 关于什么的？

translation.en: About me?
translation.zh: 关于我？

translation.en: He said that you were an exceptional professor.
translation.zh: 他说你是一位杰出的教授

translation.en: And you are an exceptional wife,
translation.zh: 你也是一位杰出的妻子

translation.en: which means the world to me.
translation.zh: 这对我来说就意味着整个世界

translation.en: Ah! I feel like having company was good for us.
translation.zh: 我觉得有人陪伴对我们来说有好处

translation.en: Yeah? We need this.
translation.zh: 是吧？我们需要陪伴

translation.en: I, uh… I want to invite my whole department over.
translation.zh: 我想邀请整个系的同事都过来

translation.en: A-- a real party. What do you think?
translation.zh: 举办一场真正的派对 你觉得如何？

translation.en: I think we owe it to Franny to make this place a happy home.
translation.zh: 我觉得为了弗兰妮 我们应该把这里 变成一个幸福的家

translation.en: I'm not against it. I just think that we need to then also invite
translation.zh: 我并不反对 我就是觉得 我们还需要邀请

translation.en: the locals and our neighbors.
translation.zh: 当地人和我们的邻居

translation.en: Neighbors? [chuckles] Really?
translation.zh: 邻居？说真的吗？

translation.en: I need to feel like I'm in this community, George, not just your community.
translation.zh: 我需要感觉我生活在这个社区里 乔治 而不仅仅是你的社区

translation.en: Okay, let's do it.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就这么做吧

translation.en: Please tell me again why I'm carrying a Bundt cake.
translation.zh: 你再告诉我一次 我为什么要带着圆环蛋糕

translation.en: We're no good at parties. Speak for yourself.
translation.zh: -我们不擅长参加派对 -只有你不擅长

translation.en: I am. Nobody wants the sheriff around when they're drunk.
translation.zh: 确实 谁喝多的时候 都不希望警长在身边

translation.en: Uh, more wine?
translation.zh: 再来点葡萄酒？

translation.en: Hi. Wine?
translation.zh: 嗨 要葡萄酒吗？

translation.en: A little. Just… just…
translation.zh: 就要一点…

translation.en: Oh! Okay, good.
translation.zh: 好 很好

translation.en: She's a friend of Bram's.
translation.zh: 她是布拉姆的一个朋友

translation.en: She's also writing.
translation.zh: 她也写作

translation.en: They both have been writing novels… Sorry. They both have been writing novels.
translation.zh: 对 他们两个都在写小说… 抱歉

translation.en: I first wore glasses when I was 13.
translation.zh: 我13岁的时候第一次戴眼镜

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Thank you, young man.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢你 小伙子

translation.en: Yes. You've done a lot with this place.
translation.zh: 是 你对这个地方改造了不少

translation.en: I want you to meet my wife Millicent, the love of my life.
translation.zh: 我想让你见见我妻子麦乐森 我一辈子的挚爱

translation.en: It's incredibly nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 好棒啊 幸会

translation.en: I hear we might have a session in your home.
translation.zh: 我听说可能会在你家举办降神会

translation.en: Yeah, soon, I hope. Thank you.
translation.zh: 对 希望尽快吧 谢谢

translation.en: George? Travis, Mare's husband.
translation.zh: 乔治？特拉维斯 梅尔的丈夫

translation.en: -A pleasure to meet you. -This is her best cake. [laughing] Oh, wow.
translation.zh: -特拉维斯 见到你很高兴 -这是她做的最好的一块蛋糕

translation.en: Thank you. We'll put it right here.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我们就放在这里吧

translation.en: [Mare] Travis? Come here. You've got to hear this.
translation.zh: 特拉维斯？过来 你一定要听听这个

translation.en: Yes, dear.
translation.zh: 好的 亲爱的

translation.en: Hm. I almost baked a cake.
translation.zh: 我差点烤了蛋糕

translation.en: Bram insisted there was something you might appreciate… even more.
translation.zh: 布拉姆坚持说你会有更喜欢的东西

translation.en: [sniffs] Oh, fantastic.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Um, shall we?
translation.zh: 去来点？

translation.en: -Yeah. Why not? -Why not?
translation.zh: -好 何妨呢？ -何妨呢？

translation.en: -This place looks marvelous, Catherine. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -这个地方看起来好棒 凯瑟琳 -谢谢

translation.en: Absolutely transformed.
translation.zh: 完全改变了

translation.en: Well, a little paint goes a really long way.
translation.zh: 粉刷一下就有这么大的改变

translation.en: [sighs] And it does my heart good to see Eddie and Cole here.
translation.zh: 看到艾迪和科尔在这里 我也很安心

translation.en: -You're a saint for having them back. -What do you mean?
translation.zh: -你把他们请回来 真是圣人 -什么意思？

translation.en: Well, they grew up here.
translation.zh: 他们是在这里长大的

translation.en: You-- you knew that, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你不知道吗？

translation.en: I-I-It's just that
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I told George the whole story when I first showed him the house and--
translation.zh: 第一次带乔治参观这所房子时 就把整件事告诉了他

translation.en: What story?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: I suppose he-- he didn't wanna upset you.
translation.zh: 我想他应该是不想让你难过

translation.en: -I-- I'm going to go find Travis. -No, no, no. What story, Mare?
translation.zh: -我去找特拉维斯 -别走 什么故事 梅尔？

translation.en: He didn't tell you anything about their parents? Hm-mm.
translation.zh: 他没有跟你提起过 他们父母的事情吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Well… it's just that…
translation.zh: 好吧…就是…

translation.en: Dear Ella, she was a friend of mine, you know, and… and…
translation.zh: 亲爱的艾拉 她之前是我的一个朋友 你知道的…

translation.en: Sometimes, I can't help but believe that she…
translation.zh: 有时 我不禁相信她…

translation.en: She's free now.
translation.zh: 她现在自由了

translation.en: And-- and I know he struggled financially,
translation.zh: 我知道他经济拮据

translation.en: but that horrible man was cruel in-- in ways that you could never know.
translation.zh: 但你永远不会知道 那个可怕男人的残忍

translation.en: What happened to them?
translation.zh: 他们怎么了？

translation.en: Catherine, it's not the time. I don't want to ruin your party.
translation.zh: 现在不是时候 我不想毁掉你们的派对

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: Mare, I'm begging you. I need to know this.
translation.zh: 梅尔 我求求你 我需要知道这件事

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: The way I… I heard it
translation.zh: 我听到的故事是

translation.en: was that… Calvin Vayle
translation.zh: 那个卡尔文·维尔

translation.en: slipped Ella and the boys
translation.zh: 某天晚上偷偷给艾拉和两个男孩

translation.en: a sedative one night.
translation.zh: 下了镇定药

translation.en: And… when they were out cold, he…
translation.zh: 等他们沉睡后 他…

translation.en: He went outside and shot every one of the cows they owned.
translation.zh: 他去外面射杀了他们拥有的所有牛

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: And then, when he was finished, he went into the garage below their…
translation.zh: 后来 他做完了这些 就进了车库 就在他们的卧室下面

translation.en: bedroom,
translation.zh: 就在他们的卧室下面

translation.en: started the ignition of two trucks and closed the windows.
translation.zh: 发动了两辆卡车 关上了窗户

translation.en: The fumes.
translation.zh: 那股气味

translation.en: Then he went up and…
translation.zh: 然后他上了楼

translation.en: laid down in bed with Ella until--
translation.zh: 和艾拉躺在床上 直到后来…

translation.en: -Oh my God, I was wrong. -They never woke up.
translation.zh: -天啊 是我错了 -他们就再也没有醒来

translation.en: I had the wrong wife. I--
translation.zh: 我搞错了妻子

translation.en: -Wrong about what? -Your friend Ella. She's here, Mare.
translation.zh: -搞错了什么？ -你的朋友艾拉 她还在这里 梅尔

translation.en: Oh my God. Where did you get this?
translation.zh: 天啊 你从哪里弄来的？

translation.en: Wh-what are you doing with this?
translation.zh: 你戴着这个干嘛？

translation.en: She never took this ring off.
translation.zh: 她从来没有摘下过戒指

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: I've been in this house for three months, and nobody has said anything to me.
translation.zh: 我在这栋房子里住了三个月 从来没有人对我说过什么

translation.en: Not the mailman, not a neighbor, not-- not the bank teller.
translation.zh: 邮差、邻居、银行柜员 都没有说什么

translation.en: God, I'm such a fool!
translation.zh: 天啊 我真傻

translation.en: No, no, it's not like that.
translation.zh: 不 不是那样的

translation.en: -Oh my God! -Catherine, we're from farm stock up here.
translation.zh: -天啊！ -凯瑟琳 我们上州这边都是农牧业

translation.en: It's-- it's not our way to get involved with people's personal business.
translation.zh: 介入别人的私事不是我们的做事风格

translation.en: You've made this home so warm and inviting,
translation.zh: 你让这个家变得这么温馨 这么好客

translation.en: and everyone's moved on so well. I'm sure that George didn't mean--
translation.zh: 所有人都已经忘掉以前的事情了 我相信乔治不是故意…

translation.en: Do not waste any of your time on George, Mare.
translation.zh: 别浪费时间为乔治辩护 梅尔

translation.en: George Claire always gets exactly what he wants.
translation.zh: 乔治·克莱尔总是得到他想要的

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
translation.zh: 你根本不了解我

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我了解

translation.en: I know you're a weaver
translation.zh: 我知道你是编织者

translation.en: of fabrics.
translation.zh: 编织衣料

translation.en: And ideas.
translation.zh: 编织想法

translation.en: Like the ideas you've been putting in my wife's head lately.
translation.zh: 比如你一直在我妻子脑中灌输的想法

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Here's something about me you don't know.
translation.zh: 我的确有你不了解的一面

translation.en: I get suspicious
translation.zh: 学生敬仰他们的教授时

translation.en: when students worship their professors.
translation.zh: 我会怀疑

translation.en: Always leads to trouble.
translation.zh: 总是会导致麻烦

translation.en: Is that a dig or advice?
translation.zh: 你这是批判还是建议？

translation.en: Oh, it's just honesty. You know, like the Good Book says.
translation.zh: 只是实话 就像《圣经》里说的那样

translation.en: "The truth will set you free."
translation.zh: “真理必叫你们得以自由”

translation.en: I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: People really don't want the truth, and they certainly don't want to be set free.
translation.zh: 人们真的不想要真理 也绝对不想要自由

translation.en: What? Says who?
translation.zh: 什么？谁说的？

translation.en: The Eagles, remember?
translation.zh: 老鹰乐队 记得吗？

translation.en: -"Hotel California." -[Justine laughs]
translation.zh: 《加州旅馆》

translation.en: Yeah. We, uh-- we all choose our own prison.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们都会选择自己的监狱

translation.en: Here, give me your hands.
translation.zh: 来 把你的手给我

translation.en: I'll show you why they're right. Here.
translation.zh: 我来告诉你 他们为什么是对的

translation.en: -You're going to read my palms now? -Come on.
translation.zh: -你要给我看手相？ -来吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Now,
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: try to get yourself free.
translation.zh: 试着让自己自由

translation.en: [grunts] Okay, that's enough. You can let go now, George.
translation.zh: 好了 够了 你可以放手了 乔治

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can, but are you sure you really want me to?
translation.zh: 我知道我可以 但你确定你真的想让我放手吗？

translation.en: -I'm very sure. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我非常确定

translation.en: George, you-- you are hurting me now.
translation.zh: 乔治 你现在弄痛我了

translation.en: Let go!
translation.zh: 放手

translation.en: W-what?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -[laughing] -Jesus Christ, George.
translation.zh: 天啊 乔治

translation.en: Hotel California, Justine.
translation.zh: 《加州旅馆》贾丝廷

translation.en: Hotel California!
translation.zh: 《加州旅馆》！

translation.en: [George] Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: -Drive safe. -[door closes]
translation.zh: 开车注意安全

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 哎…

translation.en: that was a success, huh?
translation.zh: 大获成功 是吧？

translation.en: Your friend Justine is a bit of a head case.
translation.zh: 你的朋友贾丝廷好像精神有点失常

translation.en: Is she trying to start some trouble or something?
translation.zh: 她是想搞出什么麻烦 还是怎样？

translation.en: No, I didn't see Justine all night,
translation.zh: 没有 我整晚都没有看到贾丝廷

translation.en: but it's interesting that you ask.
translation.zh: 但你问起来 倒是有趣

translation.en: Know what's interesting to me?
translation.zh: 你知道我觉得什么有趣吗？

translation.en: Is that this party was supposed to bring you and me together,
translation.zh: 是这个派对本来应该让你我和好

translation.en: and as soon as everyone leaves,
translation.zh: 大家一走

translation.en: you retreat and ice up.
translation.zh: 你就退后 跟我冷战

translation.en: How could you not tell me about this house, George?
translation.zh: 你怎么能 没跟我讲这个房子的事 乔治？

translation.en: [George sighs] Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [sighs] I was afraid this might happen.
translation.zh: 我就是担心会这样

translation.en: That one of your lies would be exposed?
translation.zh: 担心你的某个谎言会被揭穿？

translation.en: I wasn't lying to you, Cath. I was trying to spare you some unpleasantness.
translation.zh: 我没有对你说谎 凯瑟 我只是想少给你带来一些不快

translation.en: I can handle unpleasantness, George, okay? I lived through childbirth, remember?
translation.zh: 我可以应付不快 乔治 好吗？ 我孩子都生了 记得吗？

translation.en: I was trying to protect you.
translation.zh: 我是在保护你

translation.en: Believe-- believe it or not, I-I actually wanted you to be happy here.
translation.zh: 不管你是否相信 我其实都想让你在这里幸福

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么鬼？

translation.en: Fucking electricity in this house!
translation.zh: 这破房子的电！

translation.en: [George] What the…
translation.zh: 搞什么…

translation.en: The fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 这是什么情况？

translation.en: Franny's overdue for a visit with your parents.
translation.zh: 弗兰妮早该去看看爷爷奶奶了

translation.en: You can finish off the weekend there.
translation.zh: 你们可以在那里过完周末

translation.en: -[answering machine beeps] -Floyd, it's Catherine.
translation.zh: （《两人窒息死亡 死因可疑》） 弗洛伊德 我是凯瑟琳

translation.en: I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好了

translation.en: This is her. This is Ella Vayle,
translation.zh: 这就是她 这是艾拉·维尔

translation.en: and this is the article I found about her death.
translation.zh: 这是我找到的 她死亡的报道

translation.en: But she's trying to…
translation.zh: 但是她想要…

translation.en: She's reaching out to me, and I-I need to know why.
translation.zh: 她想联络我 我需要知道为什么

translation.en: You're saying the spirit is the most recent resident of your house?
translation.zh: 你说这个灵魂最近住在你家里？

translation.en: Yes. I was confused before.
translation.zh: 对 我之前还很诧异

translation.en: Well, my research turned up something interesting about the original owners,
translation.zh: 我的研究 发现了房子原主人的一些有趣信息

translation.en: especially for our group here.
translation.zh: 尤其对我们这个小组来说

translation.en: What? The Smits?
translation.zh: 什么？斯密特家族？

translation.en: Reverend Smit's wife
translation.zh: 尊敬的斯密特的妻子

translation.en: was an early devotee of Swedenborg.
translation.zh: 是史威登堡早期的信奉者

translation.en: [Floyd] Unfortunately, it was not a happy marriage.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 他们的婚姻并不幸福

translation.en: Smit was a strict Calvinist
translation.zh: 斯密特是严格的加尔文教徒

translation.en: who strongly disapproved of his wife's philosophic exploration.
translation.zh: 他坚决反对他妻子的哲学探索

translation.en: "Damned."
translation.zh: “该下地狱的”

translation.en: [Floyd] She died in their home
translation.zh: 她26岁时在家中

translation.en: rather mysteriously at age 26.
translation.zh: 离奇死亡

translation.en: So much death in my house.
translation.zh: 我的房子中死了那么多人

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Don't think of it that way.
translation.zh: 不 你别那样想

translation.en: We embrace inhabited houses as a blessing.
translation.zh: 我们接受有人住过的房子 认为那是一种福气

translation.en: -[Floyd] Mm. -[Millicent] Portals between two realms
translation.zh: 两个国度之间的通路

translation.en: with guides to shepherd us once our own time comes.
translation.zh: 等我们自己死亡之期来临的时候 有人护送引导我们

translation.en: Some religions call them guardian angels.
translation.zh: 有些宗教称他们为守护天使

translation.en: Perhaps it's our Swedenborgian friend who first opened the portal door.
translation.zh: 或许是我们这位史威登堡的朋友 打开了通路的大门

translation.en: We are good at that.
translation.zh: 我们很擅长

translation.en: [Millicent] Because it's the afterlife where we reach our greatest purpose.
translation.zh: 因为死后生活 才是我们要实现的最伟大目标

translation.en: [laughs] You never see these spirits as potentially evil?
translation.zh: 你从来没觉得这些灵魂 可能是邪恶的？

translation.en: An evil spirit will only commune with an evil-doer.
translation.zh: 邪恶的灵魂只会去纠缠邪恶的人

translation.en: [Floyd] Which we will take, on a leap of faith, that you're not.
translation.zh: 我们深深相信 你不是邪恶之人

translation.en: -[group laughs] -[local man] And remember.
translation.zh: 记住

translation.en: Evil only thrives in the house where it is welcome.
translation.zh: 邪恶只在欢迎它的房子里滋长

translation.en: -[Floyd] Mm. -[local woman] Goodness always triumphs.
translation.zh: 因为善良终究会胜利

translation.en: Always. If not in this world, then in the next.
translation.zh: 总会 即使在这个世界中无法胜利 在下个世界中也会胜利

translation.en: [Floyd] We should start,
translation.zh: 我们应该开始了

translation.en: yes?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Let whomever the spirit is
translation.zh: 不管这个灵魂是谁

translation.en: speak for herself.
translation.zh: 让她现身

translation.en: [ghostly voice] As evil comes to light,
translation.zh: 邪恶快要现身了

translation.en: beware!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: [Floyd] She's making her presence known. We welcome her, don't we, Catherine?
translation.zh: 她想要别人知道她的存在 我们欢迎她 对吧 凯瑟琳？

translation.en: We do. We… I-- I do.
translation.zh: 是的 我们…我欢迎

translation.en: [ghostly voice 2] Get back here!
translation.zh: 回来！

translation.en: -[ghostly voice] No! -[ghostly voice 2] Ella.
translation.zh: -不要！ -艾拉

translation.en: -[Catherine] What happened? -[Floyd] She wants to break through. She's trying.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -她想出去 她很努力想出去

translation.en: But something, someone is stopping her.
translation.zh: 但是什么东西 什么人在阻止她

translation.en: [ghostly voice] You're suffocating me!
translation.zh: 我喘不过气了！

translation.en: [Catherine] What was that? Oh my God.
translation.zh: 那是什么？ 我的天

translation.en: I'm afraid this home has another spirit.
translation.zh: 恐怕这个家里还有一个灵魂

translation.en: And until that spirit reveals its nature,
translation.zh: 在那个灵魂展露本性之前

translation.en: be careful of those around you, Catherine.
translation.zh: 小心你身边的人 凯瑟琳

translation.en: -[Franny] Mama, Mama! -Hi, baby.
translation.zh: -妈妈！ -嗨 宝贝

translation.en: Come here. Did you have fun at Grandma and Grandpa's house?
translation.zh: 过来 你在爷爷奶奶家玩得开心吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Did you look for seashells on the beach?
translation.zh: -开心 -你在海滩上找贝壳了吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Really? Are they pretty? Yeah!
translation.zh: -真的吗？贝壳漂亮吗？ -漂亮！

translation.en: Keep moving, everyone. Hustle.
translation.zh: 大家动起来 我们可不想进城的时候

translation.en: We don't wanna get caught in traffic on the way into the city.
translation.zh: 大家动起来 我们可不想进城的时候 赶上堵车

translation.en: Nearly there, nearly full.
translation.zh: 快好了 马上就坐满了

translation.en: Tommy, good. Thank you for com--
translation.zh: 汤米 很好 谢谢你来…

translation.en: -Justine. -George.
translation.zh: -贾丝廷 -乔治

translation.en: I, uh, I didn't know you were joining us.
translation.zh: 我不知道你也和我们一起去

translation.en: Floyd wanted an additional chaperone.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德想要多一个监护人

translation.en: [student] I'm here!
translation.zh: 我来了！

translation.en: Right, Katie. You're the last.
translation.zh: 好 凯蒂 你是最后一个

translation.en: [Franny] Where are we going?
translation.zh: 我们去哪里？

translation.en: Get in the car, baby. I'll be there in a sec.
translation.zh: 上车 宝贝 我马上就来

translation.en: Eddie!
translation.zh: 艾迪！

translation.en: There's something I have to give you that I, uh…
translation.zh: 我有个东西要给你 我…

translation.en: found in the house a while back before I learned the truth.
translation.zh: 之前不知道真相的时候 在房子里发现的

translation.en: It's a little bit tight on me.
translation.zh: 戴在我手上有一点紧

translation.en: -Just leave it. -No, no, it belongs to you and Cole.
translation.zh: -就这样吧 -不 它属于你和科尔

translation.en: She would want you to have this.
translation.zh: 她肯定想让你们拥有

translation.en: I don't want it.
translation.zh: 我不想要

translation.en: I noticed it on you a couple weeks ago.
translation.zh: 我几周之前就发现你戴着了

translation.en: It just seemed right.
translation.zh: 感觉你戴着才是对的

translation.en: You and Mom would have liked each other.
translation.zh: 你和我妈妈肯定会彼此喜欢的

translation.en: Three on the bottom are on time.
translation.zh: 下面的三本没有超期 我在我丈夫的车里

translation.en: I found that overdue one in my husband's car, I can pay the fine.
translation.zh: 下面的三本没有超期 我在我丈夫的车里 找到一本超期的 我可以付罚款

translation.en: It's just on his card.
translation.zh: 他借的

translation.en: Actually, this one's checked out under the name Willis Howell.
translation.zh: 这本是以 维利斯·霍韦尔的名字借出的

translation.en: Oh, that's odd.
translation.zh: 好奇怪

translation.en: It's unisex, you know?
translation.zh: 这个名字男女通用 你知道吗？

translation.en: Excuse me? The name, Willis.
translation.zh: -什么？ -维利斯这个名字

translation.en: She's a pretty thing.
translation.zh: 这个女生很漂亮

translation.en: In here a lot on weekends.
translation.zh: 很多个周末都来这里

translation.en: Daddy's friend.
translation.zh: 爸爸的朋友

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll ask her to pay the fine.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会让她付罚金的

translation.en: I'd like to open a new account.
translation.zh: 我想开一个新账户

translation.en: Of course, Mrs. Claire.
translation.zh: 没问题 克莱尔太太

translation.en: Uh, just… just fill out, um,
translation.zh: 请填好

translation.en: this form.
translation.zh: 这张表

translation.en: Uh, we will require George's signature if it's a joint account.
translation.zh: 如果这是双方共有账户 我们会要求乔治签名

translation.en: It's not.
translation.zh: 不是共有

translation.en: [George] Okay, everyone. Here we are.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我们到了

translation.en: [man] George Claire?
translation.zh: 乔治·克莱尔？

translation.en: [chuckles] Good God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Dr. Warren. Wow. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 沃伦博士

translation.en: What an odd coincidence.
translation.zh: 真是巧啊

translation.en: Odd indeed.
translation.zh: 确实够巧的

translation.en: I was told that you had moved away for good.
translation.zh: 我听说你已经彻底搬走了

translation.en: Well, I, you know, couldn't resist coming back for this exhibit.
translation.zh: 我禁不住诱惑 想回来看这个展

translation.en: You might remember my passion for Thomas Cole.
translation.zh: 你或许还记得 我对托马斯·科尔的热情

translation.en: Yes, I do. I just wish you had shown the same passion for your dissertation.
translation.zh: 是的 我记得 我真希望你对你的论文 也能展现出这种热情

translation.en: Excuse me. Professor Claire, um,
translation.zh: 打扰一下 克莱尔教授

translation.en: in the third Voyage of Life painting, why is the sailor so distraught?
translation.zh: 在第三幅《生命之旅》画作中 乘船者为什么那么心烦意乱？

translation.en: Oh, the third one is called, uh, Manhood.
translation.zh: 第三幅叫做《中年》

translation.en: Uh, it's when Cole believes we, uh, we lose the confidence of youth.
translation.zh: 在这个时期 科尔相信 我们失去了年轻时的信心

translation.en: Uh, go-- go check out the sailor's hands. They're no longer on the tiller.
translation.zh: 去看看乘船者的手 已经不在船舵上了

translation.en: -[student] Thanks, Professor Claire. -[Dr. Warren clears throat]
translation.zh: 谢谢克莱尔教授

translation.en: Yeah… You know, I'm curious. Um…
translation.zh: 其实 我很好奇

translation.en: How did you get a teaching position without a recommendation?
translation.zh: 你没有人推荐 是怎么拿到教职工作的？

translation.en: Oh, I'm, um, I'm just a temp instructor.
translation.zh: 我只是一个临时讲师

translation.en: Um, one of the professors took an emergency leave, and I, uh…
translation.zh: 有一个教授突然请假了 我就…

translation.en: I just stepped in to help.
translation.zh: 我就过来帮忙

translation.en: Interesting, then, how the students, uh, they call you professor.
translation.zh: 学生们居然叫你教授 真有意思

translation.en: [chuckling awkwardly] Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Uh, yeah, right. I keep correcting them.
translation.zh: 是啊 对 我一直纠正他们

translation.en: Yeah. I get so tired of correcting them.
translation.zh: 是啊 纠正到我都很厌烦了

translation.en: Good day, Claire.
translation.zh: 再见 克莱尔

translation.en: What…
translation.zh: 刚才…

translation.en: What was all that about?
translation.zh: 刚才怎么回事？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I have no idea.
translation.zh: 是啊 我也不知道

translation.en: I kind of think you do.
translation.zh: 我觉得你知道

translation.en: I don't think you should see Justine anymore.
translation.zh: 我觉得你不应该再见贾丝廷了

translation.en: There's a lot of talk about her at Saginaw.
translation.zh: 塞基诺学院有很多她的流言

translation.en: What kind of talk, George?
translation.zh: 什么样的流言 乔治？

translation.en: Well, they say she's a closet lesbian.
translation.zh: 他们说她是没出柜的同性恋

translation.en: And she's clearly obsessed with you.
translation.zh: 显然她对你很痴迷

translation.en: [sighs] I think she is…
translation.zh: 我觉得她是…

translation.en: instigating problems between us intentionally.
translation.zh: 故意在我们之间挑起争端

translation.en: [George] Floyd, heading home for the holiday? [Floyd] What?
translation.zh: -弗洛伊德 假期回家吗？ -什么？

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Not for a while yet. I-I still have, uh…
translation.zh: 不是 近期不会 我还要…

translation.en: -I have work to finish. -Is something wrong?
translation.zh: -我还有工作要完成 -出什么事了吗？

translation.en: Actually,
translation.zh: 其实

translation.en: I got a call this morning from Shelby Warren,
translation.zh: 我今天早上接到了谢比·沃伦的电话

translation.en: your advisor from Columbia.
translation.zh: 是你在哥伦比亚的导师

translation.en: His recommendation letter, the one submitted with your application,
translation.zh: 他的推荐信 你申请职位时提交的

translation.en: he claims he never wrote it.
translation.zh: 他说他没有写过

translation.en: Shelby's recollection is that you asked him,
translation.zh: 按照谢比的记忆 他说你问他了

translation.en: but he told you he couldn't do it.
translation.zh: 但是他告诉你 不能给你写

translation.en: In good conscience. I remember the conversation well.
translation.zh: 凭良心讲 这段对话我记忆犹新

translation.en: -You forged it, didn't you? -No. I… I…
translation.zh: -是你伪造的 是吧？ -不是 我…

translation.en: Floyd, I wrote the letter that I deserved.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德 我只是写了 我该得到的推荐信
