translation.en: I-- I-- You need to understand why.
translation.zh: 你需要明白为什么

translation.en: As you know, I'm quite fond of you, George,
translation.zh: 你也知道 我非常喜欢你

translation.en: and you're popular with your students, but this is a serious accusation.
translation.zh: 你很受学生的欢迎 但这是很严肃的指控

translation.en: Can't we put a pin in this until after the holiday? -Oh… -Please, please, Floyd.
translation.zh: 我们能不能放假回来之后 再来处理这件事 弗洛伊德？

translation.en: I-- I understand your dilemma. I do.
translation.zh: 我明白你的难处 真的

translation.en: Floyd, I-- I have my entire family up here.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德 我的整个家庭都搬到了这里

translation.en: I'm supposed to be home in an hour.
translation.zh: 我一小时后就该到家了

translation.en: I-- I really deserve the chance to sit down and be heard.
translation.zh: 我真的应该得到一个坐下来 你听我说的机会

translation.en: Man to man, huh?
translation.zh: 两个男人之间的对话

translation.en: Friend to friend.
translation.zh: 两个朋友之间的对话

translation.en: I'll schedule an appointment.
translation.zh: 我会安排见面

translation.en: [man] I know you all think that Audrey is a quite calm, conservative soul,
translation.zh: 我知道你们认为 奥黛丽有着平静、保守的灵魂

translation.en: but back in the day, she was absolutely wild.
translation.zh: 但是在以前 她非常野

translation.en: -Don't believe a word! -And then George came along.
translation.zh: -我根本不信！ -然后乔治出生了

translation.en: And he was always getting into trouble,
translation.zh: 他总是惹麻烦

translation.en: which is why I went gray by 30.
translation.zh: 所以我才30岁就长了不少白头发

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, stop!
translation.zh: 别说了！

translation.en: But the real troublemaker was this cousin that George idolized.
translation.zh: 但是真正制造麻烦的人 是乔治崇敬的这个表哥 居然是个货真价实的同性恋

translation.en: Turned out to be a first-class homo.
translation.zh: 是乔治崇敬的这个表哥 居然是个货真价实的同性恋

translation.en: I don't know what was worse for his parents: that he drowned or was gay.
translation.zh: 真不知道他父母觉得哪一个更糟 当同性恋 还是溺水而亡

translation.en: That is a truly repugnant thing to say.
translation.zh: 你这样说就太令人反感了

translation.en: She's right, Tom.
translation.zh: 她说得对 汤姆

translation.en: Henry's death was a family tragedy.
translation.zh: 亨利的死是一个家庭悲剧

translation.en: He was such a talented young man.
translation.zh: 他生前也是那么有天赋的年轻人

translation.en: Henry used to do these exquisite watercolors. Teeny-tiny paintings.
translation.zh: 亨利以前会画精美的水彩 小小的画

translation.en: What were the… the paintings of?
translation.zh: 他都画了什么？

translation.en: Oh, the shoreline, ospreys, lighthouses.
translation.zh: 海岸线、鱼鹰、灯塔

translation.en: Just common seaside things.
translation.zh: 就是海边常见的那些东西

translation.en: Turkey time, everybody.
translation.zh: 火鸡来了 各位

translation.en: It's the way he presented them that was unique.
translation.zh: 他的画作构图非常独特

translation.en: They even wanted to do a showing of his work after he passed, but…
translation.zh: 他去世之后 他们还想 给他的画作办一个展览 但是…

translation.en: they all just disappeared, apparently.
translation.zh: 听说那些画作都消失了

translation.en: -[Catherine's mom] What a shame. -It really was.
translation.zh: -真可惜 -真的是

translation.en: -[man] Nice job on the turkey, George. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -火鸡做得不错 乔治 -谢谢

translation.en: Please, eat. It's gonna get cold.
translation.zh: 吃吧 一会儿该变冷了

translation.en: Could you excuse me one minute?
translation.zh: 我可以失陪一下吗？

translation.en: So you're starting with all this again?
translation.zh: 所以你又来了？

translation.en: I happen to be sick, George.
translation.zh: 我就是突然感觉恶心 乔治

translation.en: Throwing up my marriage.
translation.zh: 吐出我的婚姻

translation.en: Now leave me the fuck alone!
translation.zh: 你他妈别烦我

translation.en: -Catherine… -[door slams, lock clicks]
translation.zh: 凯瑟琳…

translation.en: [George] What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Cath? Catherine?
translation.zh: 凯瑟？凯瑟琳？

translation.en: [Audrey] George?
translation.zh: 乔治？

translation.en: [Ella] Please.
translation.zh: 求你

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你

translation.en: [male ghostly voice] No one understands us.
translation.zh: 没有人理解我们

translation.en: I am here for you.
translation.zh: 我是来支持你的

translation.en: George.
translation.zh: 乔治

translation.en: Free yourself.
translation.zh: 解放自己吧

translation.en: [Floyd, in distance] How was your holiday?
translation.zh: 假期过得如何？

translation.en: Hello, Floyd.
translation.zh: 你好 弗洛伊德

translation.en: George.
translation.zh: 乔治

translation.en: I didn't expect to see you till tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我以为明天才会见到你

translation.en: Taking advantage of the warm spell we're having, huh?
translation.zh: 好好利用一下 现在还拥有的温暖咒语 是吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I thought I'd go out one last time before storing her for winter.
translation.zh: 对 我觉得应该再出航一次 之后就要收起来过冬了

translation.en: You're so lucky to have her.
translation.zh: 你拥有这艘船 真的好幸运

translation.en: That last spin you took me on, it… [grunts]
translation.zh: 你上次带我去航行

translation.en: …it really reminded me how much I-- I miss sailing.
translation.zh: 真的让我想起了 我有多怀念航行

translation.en: Especially when…
translation.zh: 尤其是…

translation.en: when I'm feeling a little… a little low.
translation.zh: 我感觉有些低落的时候

translation.en: You want to join me?
translation.zh: 你想一起来吗？

translation.en: Oh, no. I-- I…
translation.zh: 不了 我…

translation.en: -I don't want to in-- intrude. -It's fine.
translation.zh: -我不想打扰你 -没事的

translation.en: The river's as good a place as any to have our talk.
translation.zh: 河水中也一样适合我们交谈

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: What's the matter? Are you okay?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你没事吧？

translation.en: Things…
translation.zh: 事情…

translation.en: just aren't great.
translation.zh: 就是不太好

translation.en: It's him, isn't it?
translation.zh: 是他 是吧？

translation.en: I know his kind all too well.
translation.zh: 我太了解他们那种人了

translation.en: I grew up with it.
translation.zh: 我就是在这种人身边长大的

translation.en: If I had someone as good as you, I'd kiss the fucking ground she walked on.
translation.zh: 如果我拥有你这么好的妻子 我都愿意亲吻她走过的土地 我向上帝发誓

translation.en: I swear to God.
translation.zh: 我都愿意亲吻她走过的土地 我向上帝发誓

translation.en: [George] I'm eager to tell you the truth
translation.zh: 我迫切地想告诉你事实

translation.en: about the…
translation.zh: 那件事…

translation.en: problems I had at Columbia with… with Shelby.
translation.zh: 我和谢比在哥伦比亚大学的问题

translation.en: Look, it's a complicated story, but, um…
translation.zh: 其实真是个复杂的故事 但是…

translation.en: essentially,
translation.zh: 简单来说

translation.en: I got ostracized…
translation.zh: 我因为报告不当行为

translation.en: for reporting misconduct.
translation.zh: 被边缘化了

translation.en: It was… it was sexual misconduct.
translation.zh: 是不当性行为

translation.en: Look, I'm willing to listen, because I-- I care about your well-being,
translation.zh: 我愿意听 因为我在乎你的身心健康

translation.en: but forgery,
translation.zh: 但是伪造

translation.en: regardless of the reason,
translation.zh: 不论你有任何理由

translation.en: is a crime.
translation.zh: 都是犯罪

translation.en: I don't want us meeting on false pretenses here.
translation.zh: 我不希望我们的认识 建立在伪装的基础上

translation.en: I can't keep this to myself forever.
translation.zh: 我不能再自己独守秘密了

translation.en: Yeah, I-I understand that, and-and, look, I appreciate your dilemma--
translation.zh: 我明白 我懂你的为难…

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: So tomorrow, I plan to bring the situation to HR.
translation.zh: 所以明天 我打算把这个情况报告给人事

translation.en: And we both know the outcome.
translation.zh: 我们都知道会有怎样的后果

translation.en: They won't permit you to remain on staff.
translation.zh: 他们不会允许你继续做教职的

translation.en: You okay, George?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 乔治？

translation.en: There, there.
translation.zh: 好了 没事

translation.en: All things must pass.
translation.zh: 一切都会过去的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I promise you'll get through this.
translation.zh: 我保证 你会挺过去的

translation.en: -Hey, Cal. -Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨 卡尔

translation.en: I called in a take-out order.
translation.zh: 我打过电话 定外卖

translation.en: Be right back.
translation.zh: 马上回来

translation.en: [chuckles] Excuse me. Sorry, I just wonder…
translation.zh: 打扰一下 抱歉 我在想…

translation.en: Where did you buy that scarf?
translation.zh: 你那条围巾是哪里买的？

translation.en: It was a gift.
translation.zh: 别人送的

translation.en: [Cal] There you go, $6.57.
translation.zh: 给你 6.57美元

translation.en: Thanks. Just two back, please.
translation.zh: 谢谢 给我找两美元零钱

translation.en: You're putting in late nights too, huh, George?
translation.zh: 你也加夜班吗 乔治？

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Look--

translation.zh: 贾丝廷 时间到了

translation.en: [Audrey] George?
translation.zh: 乔治？

translation.en: Someone called while you were sleeping.
translation.zh: 你睡觉的时候 有人打来电话

translation.en: -Another journalist? -No, no.
translation.zh: -又是记者？ -不是

translation.en: Someone claiming to be an old friend.
translation.zh: 一个自称是老朋友的人

translation.en: They left a message. Very cryptic.
translation.zh: 还留了一条信息 非常让人费解

translation.en: Did you get a name?
translation.zh: 你知道那人的名字吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 知道

translation.en: Sokolov. Justine Sokolov.
translation.zh: 索科洛夫 贾丝廷·索科洛夫

translation.en: I'll just…
translation.zh: 我就…

translation.en: [Calvin] They made this happen.
translation.zh: 是他们让这一切发生

translation.en: [echoing] It's their fault.
translation.zh: 是他们的错

translation.en: They have always tried to hold you back.
translation.zh: 他们总是试图阻止你

translation.en: You are envied.
translation.zh: 你被人妒忌

translation.en: Unrecognized.
translation.zh: 不被认可

translation.en: Trust in your impulses.
translation.zh: 相信自己的冲动

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: I can't let you go out.
translation.zh: 我不能让你出航

translation.en: -That boat isn't up-to-date on fees. -Just going out for a minute.
translation.zh: -这艘船的一些费用还没结清 -我就开出去一会儿

translation.en: No, can't let it happen.
translation.zh: 不行 我不能让你开出去

translation.en: I'd really appreciate it, sir.
translation.zh: 我会非常感激你的 先生

translation.en: Mind just giving me a hand?
translation.zh: 介意帮我一下吗？

translation.en: Travis.
translation.zh: 特拉维斯

translation.en: Good afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: Up for a chat? Yeah.
translation.zh: -可以聊一下吗？ -可以

translation.en: [Ella and Catherine] The gates of Hell are only visible
translation.zh: 地狱之门只有那些

translation.en: to those about to come into it.
translation.zh: 想要进入的人才能看见

translation.en: He who is evil
translation.zh: 他很邪恶

translation.en: is also in the punishment of evil.
translation.zh: 同时也被邪恶所惩罚

translation.en: Damned.
translation.zh: 该下地狱的

translation.en: Damned.
translation.zh: 该下地狱的

translation.en: Damned.
translation.zh: 该下地狱的

translation.en: [Ella and Catherine] Damned. Damned.
translation.zh: 该下地狱的

translation.en: The world of spirits is not Heaven or Hell.
translation.zh: 灵魂的世界既不是天堂 也不是地狱

translation.en: We stand between the two.
translation.zh: 我们站在两者之间

translation.en: We have lost our children.
translation.zh: 我们都失去了自己的孩子

translation.en: Because of you,
translation.zh: 因为你

translation.en: we are joined in spirit.
translation.zh: 我们的灵魂结为一体

translation.en: Because of you,
translation.zh: 因为你

translation.en: our powers grow…
translation.zh: 我们的力量增长

translation.en: …from tiny drops…
translation.zh: 从微小的水滴

translation.en: …into an endless sea.
translation.zh: 汇聚成一片汪洋大海
